Moses Ssemambo akulira ebyenvuba e Masaka Abavubi okwogera bino, basinzidde ku myalo okuli; Kaziru, Bukakata ne Lambu nga gino gisangibwa mu ggombolola y’e Bukakata. Abavunaanyizibwa ku by’envuba n’abeekitongole ky’obutonde bw’ensi ekya Action for Sustainable Development Initiative okuva ku disitulikiti, babadde bagenzeeyo nga banoonyereza ku mbeera eno eriwo. Abavubi babategeezezza nti embeera ebasusseeko wadde ng’abakugu bagamba nti okunoonyereza okwakolebwa kw’alaga nti tebifa butwa naye ekituufu ekibitta tekinnamanyika. Akulira kkampuni ya Mpongo evunaanyizibwa ku mwalo gwa Lambu, Rashid Babu, annyonnyodde nti bali mu kutya kuba tebakyasobola kuvuba era nga n’amaato ge bakozesa baagasimba olw’embeera eno ey’okusoberwa. Ate ye akulira okulwanirira obutonde bw’ensi e Masaka, Rose Nakyejjwe, agambye nti obuzibu buva ku bantu abasaanyaawo butonde wamu n’abo abasuula kasasiro mu mazzi, ekintu ky’agamba nti kya bulabe era n’alabula abalima mu ntobazzi. Asabye wabeewo enkola ennung’amu erambika enkozesa y’ebigimusa, eddagala ery’obutwa wamu ne pulaasitiika okukendeeza ku kusaanawo kw’obutonde bw’ensi. Wano akulira ebyenvuba ku disitulikiti eno, Moses Ssemambo, asabye abavubi obutaggwaamu maanyi kubanga kino kigenda kuggwaawo mu bwangu nga kivudde ku kukendeera kw’omukka ogw’obulamu ekiviirako ebyennyanja okuziyira. Bo bannakyewa abalwanirira obutonde bw’ensi okuva mu kitongole kya Action for Sustainable Development Initiative nga bakulembeddwamu Antonio Kalyango, balabudde gavumenti ku bunafu mu kukwasisa amateeka ku butonde bw’ensi nti kye kivuddeko obuzibu eggwanga ne lifiirizibwa ensimbi.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza emipiira gy’Amasaza
text: Mukuumaddamula w’Obwakabaka, Charles Peter Mayiga, ategeezezza nti ekimu ku by’obugagga Uganda n’omulembe Omutebi bye gulina, bye by’emizannyo. Katikkiro Mayiga nga atongozza emipiira gy’Amasaza Bino Katikkiro Mayiga abyogeredde mu bimuli bya Bulange bw’abadde atongoza empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza egy’omwaka guno, leero ku Lwokubiri. “Omulembe Omutebi guzze n’ebyagwo ebipya, n’okubangula abantu era kaakati tukimanyi nti ekimu ku by’obugagga Uganda by’erina gy’emizannyo. Atannaba kukimanya tannayingira mu mulembe guno Omutebi.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Katikkiro n’abamu ku bavugirizi b’emipiira gino Owek. Mayiga agambye nti ebyemizannyo kya Buganda ekisinga ebbeeyi kubanga kibeera kitone ekyekwese mu muntu era singa akivumbula kibeera kizibu okuvuganya naye. Mayiga akubirizza abavubuka okuvumbula ebitone byabwe ng’obudde bukyali, kubanga ebyemizannyo biraze nti bisobola okugatta abantu yonna gye bali awatali kufa ku byabufuzi wadde amawanga. Ategeezezza ng’emizannyo bwe biyambye okutumbula erinnya lya Uganda okwetooloola ensi era n’awa ebyokulabirako okuli; Denis Onyango, Farouk Miya, Joshua Cheptegei, Kiprotich, Halima Nakaayi n’abalala. Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti mu mulembe guno Omutebi, ebyemizannyo byakukwatibwanga nga ekyobugagga era babikulaakulanye nga baagazisa abantu okukyettanira. Alaze nti Obwakabaka bwetegese emipiira gino okuzannyirwa mu nkola ya ssaayansi nga gigenda kulagibwa butereevu ku BBS Terefayina era n’asaba abantu bonna okugigoberera. Minisita Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe asiimye abavujjirizi okuli; Centenary Bank, UNAIDS, Airtel ne Fufa olw’okuvaayo ne beenyigira mu nteekateeka eno naddala mu mbeera eno eya Ssennyiga Corona. Ssekabembe agambye nti ku mulundi guno omulamwa gw’emipiira gino gugenda kubeera ku kukulembeza abaami okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya kisobole okutaasa abaana ab’obuwala. Ono yeebazizza Obwakabaka ne Bannamikago olwokulaba ng’ekikopo kino kibeeerawo. Ku mpaka z’omulundi guno, Obwakabaka bweyamye okukebera abazannyi bonna ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona, okusuza ttiimu zonna ku Fufa Technical Center e Njeru, okuliisa ttiimu zonna n’okusasulira ttiimu zonna ensimbi z’okwewandiisa. Mu birala kwe kuwaayo ensimbi obukadde 4 eri buli ttiimu okusobola okwetegeka n’okuzitambuza, okuwaayo ebikozesebwa ng’emipiira wamu n’okulaba nti omupiira gulagibwa ku BBS Terefayina. Owek. Ssekabembe agasseeko nti abantu wansi mu byalo balina okukwasizaako ttiimu zino ku nsonga z’ensako y’abazannyi wamu n’ensonga endala Obwakabaka ze butasobodde kukolalako. Okusinziira ku nteekateeka y’okuggulawo emipiira gino, Butambala egenda kwambalagana ne Bulemeezi wali ku kisaawe kya Fufa Technical Centre e Njeru nga 12/ Dec/2020.

headline: Abalangira baweze okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya
text: Ssaabalangira wa Buganda, Godfrey Musanje Kikulwe, aweze ku lw’Abalangira n’Abambejja kwongera amaanyi mu kuteeka mu nkola okulambiika kwa Ssaabasajja okwokulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Sirimu, kiyambeko okukendeeza obulwadde buno mu bantu. Abalangira n’Abambejja n’endokwa z’emiti gyebafunye okutaasa Obutonde Okuwera kuno Ssaabalangira akukoze aggalawo olukiiko lw’Olulyo Olulangira olw’omwaka guno olutudde ku Kigango kyabwe e Mmengo enkya ya leero ku Lwokuna okulaba bye basobodde okutuukako. “Omulimu guno si gwa Ssaabasajja yekka naye n’Olulyo Olulangira wamu n’abantu abalala bonna tulina okulaba nga tumukwasizaako okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino.” Ssaabalangira Musanje bw’agambye. Asabye nti wadde amaaso abantu bagatadde ku Ssennyiga Corona naye basaanye okujjukira nti Mukenenya akyaliyo era bafube okulaba nga bamutangira. Bano era baliko enteekateeka ze banjudde okuteekawo eggwandiisizo eryawamu, kimalewo okusika omuguwa mu lulyo Olulangira. Ssaabalangira asinzidde wano n’akubiriza Abalangira okuyambako mu nteekateeka ey’okukuuma ettaka lyabwe n’ebifo ebyenkizo ebitandise okwesenzaako abantu awatali kufuna lukkusa kuva mu bantu balivunaanyizibwako. Ono alaze obwetaavu bw’okuteekawo ensawo y’Olulyo Olulangira eneeyamba singa wanaabaawo obwetaavu era kibayambe okusobola okwekulaakulanya. Asuubizza nti mu bwangu bagenda kuzimba ekigango kyabwe, kisobole okutuukana n’omutindo. Abalangira n’Abambejja era baagala okuteeka ekibumbe eky’enjawulo ku luguudo ekiggyayo obulungi akabonero k’Olulyo Olulangira. Ssaabalangira Musanje aweze okwongera okukumaakuma Abalangira basobole okwewala ebibawula era ng’asuubira nti eggwandiisizo ligenda kubayamba okulambika kino. Olukiiko luno lwetabiddwamu Abalangira abakulira Amasiga nga bano baweereddwa endokwa z’emiti ez’okusimba okwongera okukuuma obutonde bw’ensi.

headline: Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kasabye omusango gwa Nyanzi gugobwe
text: Akakiiko k’ebyokulondakasabye omulamuzi agobe omusango Fred Nyanzi gwe yatwala mu kkooti enkulu ng’awakanya okulondebwa kwa Muhammad Nserekonga tegunnawulirwa, kuba teguliimu makulu nga Nsereko teyaweebwa bbaluwa eraga nti baamuwaabira. Nyanzi nga ye mukulu wa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu yaddukiramu kkooting’awakanya ebyalangirirwa mu kalulu kanga January 14ng’agamba ntiNsereko yabba akalulu era n’awaabira akakiiko k’ebyokulonda awamu n’eyakuliramu okulondesa. Ku Mmande, omusango guno guzzeemu okuwulirwa era bannamateeka basatu nga bakulembeddwa Robert Bautu, Bernard Mutyaba ne Saudah Nsereko, bategeezezza kkooti ntiku Lwokutaano Muhammad Nsereko yabawa ebiragiro okubaawo mu kkooti naye ne balemerakonti tebalina musango gwonna gwe bamanyi gwawaabirwa muntu waabwe. “Nalagiddwa okulabikako mu maaso goOwek. Omulamuzi naye tetufunangako bbaluwa yonna eraga nti omuntu waffe baamuwaabira. Tuzze wano olw’okuba erinnya ly’omuntu waffe lyayogeddwako mu musango guno ate nga tagumanyiiko, tuzze kulaba bigenda mu maaso.” Bautu bw’agambye. Bannamateeka b’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga bakulembeddwa Eric Sabiiti, basabye kkooti egobe omusango guno kuba gwakubamalira biseera. “Omusango tegusobola kugenda mu maaso nga Nsereko taguliimu. Nsereko ye yawangula. Noolwekyo omusango tegusobola kugenda mu maaso nga eyawangulwa akalulu kano taliiwo.” Sabiiti bw’agambye. OmulamuziMargaret Apiny asabye bannamateeka okuteeka ensonga zaabwe mu buwandiike baziweeyo nga tannasalawo ku nsonga eno. Kinajjukirwa nti Fred Nyanzi Ssentamu yaddukira mu kkooti ng’agamba nti akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Nsereko beekobaana ne bamunyagako obuwanguzi bwe mu kulonda kwa January 14. Okusinziira ku Nsereko, ebifo ebironderwamu ebiwera 50 byonna byakolebwamu ensobi ezaalema akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okunnyonnyola, ekintu ekikontana n’amateeka g’ebyokulonda. “Abakuliramu okulondesa awamu n’abantu abaali balondesa baawaayo ebintu ebikyamu mu bugenderevu mu kiwandiiko ekyali kiraga ebivudde mu kulonda era kino ne kikosa ebyava mu kalulu ebyalangirirwa.” Nyanzi bw’ategeezezza.

headline: Museveni Akkirizza Akeedi Ne Saluuni Okuddamu Okukola
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni akkirizza akeedi 110 okuddamu okukola oluvannyuma lw’okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo ebyateekebwawo aba minisitule y’ebyobulamu okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bano babadde ku muggalo okumala emyezi ena. Bwababadde ayogerako eri eggwanga akawungeezi kaleelo, Museveni agambye nti Kampala erina abizimbe 230 nga ku bino, ebizimbe 170 byakeberebwa kyokka 110 byokka byebyasangibwa nga bisaanidde okuddamu okukola. Museveni yagambye ebimu ku birina okugobererwa kwekulaba nga buli kizimbe kirina obuuma obukebera ebbugumu, ebifo wanaabirwa engalo, okuggya abantu bonna bakolera mu nkuubo, okuwandiika buli muntu yenna ayingira mukizimbe. Mu balala abaguddwa kuliko aba saluuni naye nga nabo balina okugoberera ebiragiro bya ministule nga ebya abakeedi byebalina okugoberera. Ate aba boda boda pulezidenti nabo akkirizza baddemu bakole okutandika wiiki ejja nga July 27. Bano kigenda kuba kyabuwaze okwambala akakookolo ssaako ne bikoofiira bikatamu giyite helmet. Abasaabaza nabo balina okwambala masiki. Owa boda boda era alina okuwandiika buli muntu alinnya pikipikiye. Mu birala omukulembeze w’eggwanga era akendeezezza ku ssaawa za kafiyu nga kati agenda ku tandika nga saawa ssatu ez’ekiro nakoma saawa kkumi neemu n’ekitundu ez’olweggulo. Kyokka bo aba boda boda baakukomanga ssaawa 12 okukola. KIno Museveni agamba akikoze olw’okusobola okukendeeza obumenyi bwamateeka. “Okutuusa nga mwetereezezza nemwejjamu abakozi b’ebikolobero, mujja kukoma saawa 12,” Museveni bweygamabye. Ebyo nga bikyalyawo, Museveni awolerezza minisita w’ebyobulamu Jane Ruth Aceng nti teyakigenderera kukuba lukungaana e Lira. Museveni agambye nti yali asabye Aceng obuteesimbawo mu byabufuzi wabula oluvannyuma lwa coronavirus okujja mu Uganda, yafuuka wa ttutumu ewaabwe e Lira abantu nebamusaba okwesimbawo. Bweyagendayo nabamukungaanirako. “Nkakasa nti si yeyayita abantu abo naye kino kibe kyakulabirako nti singa tosobola kuziyiza bantu kukungaanirako tukoba lukungaana okutuusa nga coronavirus aweddeyo,” Museveni bweyagambye.

headline: Museveni alabudde Bobi Wine : Toli wa kitalo
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni avuddeyo n’alabula abantu bonna abeetaba mu kwekalakaasa oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa kwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) nti, ono si wakitalo atalina kukwatibwako. Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni Museveni bwe yabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga wali ku Mbale State Lodge gy’ali mu kunoonya obululu, yagambye nti abamu ku bannabyabufuzi nga bayambibwako abagwira baagala okulaga Uganda ng’ensi etalina Mirembe era erimu enfuga embi. Museveni yannyonnyodde nti kino bakikola nga bayita mu kutulugunya bannaabwe, okusuula emisanvu mu kkubo wamu n’okwonoona ebintu. Ono obwedda ayogera nga bw’alaga obutambi obwakwatibwa mu kwekalakaasa, yavumiridde ebikolwa bino aba Opozisoni bye bayita demokulaasiya n’ategeeza nti nga gavumenti tebagenda kubigumiikiriza. “Abantu 54 baafiira mu kwekalakaasa kuno nga poliisi egezaako okubagumbulula nga ku bano 32 baali beekalakaasa. Abamu baakubwa amasasi mu butanwa ate ababiri ne batomerwa emmotoka oluvannyuma lwa ddereeva waayo okukubwa ejjinja n’emulemerera.” Museveni bwe yagambye. Okusinziira ku alipoota eyamuweereddwa, Museveni agamba nti abantu abataano abattibwa mu bitundu by’e Nansana baali beekalakaasa era nga baali bagezaako okulumba poliisi. Ku bumu ku butambi obwalaze abapoliisi ng’emmundu bazitunuza mu bantu bakuba amasasi, Museveni yannyonnyodde nti byali Nsangi omupoliisi Kidega gye yakubwa abeekalakaasa era abaalabibwa mu mmotoka ya Pick Up nga bakuba amasasi mu bantu baali bataasa mupoliisi ono. “Okukubwa amasasi mu butanwa kubeerawo ng’olina gw’ogenderera okukuba naye n’otamukwasa olwo n’olumya abalala.” Museveni bwe yannyonnyodde. Museveni yagasseeko nti, abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi kye baalina okukola ng’akwatiddwa kwe kulinda n’atwalibwa mu kkooti. Ono yavumiridde eky’abawagizi be okukitwala nti talina kukwatibwako kubanga munnabyabufuzi era n’abalabula obutaddira kwekalakaasa. Yasabye abalina amatu okuwulira era bakimanye nti tebalina gwe bayamba mu kukuuma amateeka n’emirembe.

headline: Ab’Omukago gwa Bulaaya okukyalira ‘People Power’ kiraga bwesige – NUP
text: Ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) ategeezezza nga okukyalakw’ababaka b’omukaga gwa Bulaaya bwekulaze nti ekisinde kya People Power n’ekibiina ki NUP babikiririzaamu okuleetawo enkyukakyuka mu ggwanga mu kalulu ka 2021. Ensisinkano y’ababaka bano ababadde bakuliddwa akulira omukago guno mu Uganda Attilio Pacific n’abakulembeze ba NUP yamalidde ddala essaawa 4.Oluvanyuma lw’ensisinkano eno, omwogezi wa NUP Joel Ssenyonyi yagaanye okulambulula ku byateeseddwako wabula nategeeza nti ensisinkano ebadde nkulu nkulu nnyo eri eby’obufuzi bya Uganda. Ssenyonyi yagambye nti bakozesezza akakisa kano okutongozza ebigendererwa n’emiramwa gy’ekibiina kino, n’okulaba nga batwala obuyinza kuba omukago guno gwe gumu kwejjo egiwaniridde eby’enfuna by’eggwanga. Ono yanyonyodde nti ba Ambasada babadde bagala okumanya ebikwata ku kibiina kyabwe n’okulaba engeri gyebeetegekeddemu akalulu ka 2021.Ssenyonyi agamba nti b’ ambasada bano balaze nga bwebali mukwogeraganya ne gavumenti nti abeesimbyewi bonna bayisibwa kyenkanyi. Wabula yawakkanyizza ebyogerwa nti omukago guno gwe gubateekamu ssente nti ssi kituufu kuba ssente bazijja mu bannayuganda .

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye Uganda erabire ku Kenya ku kalulu
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga atendereza nnyo engeri akalulu mu ggwanga lya Kenya gyekakakwatiddwamu okutwalizaamu okuva lwe katandika okutuuka lwekalangiriddwa eggulo ku Mmande nasaba ab’obuyinza mu Uganda okubalabirako. Bino Katikkiro Mayiga abyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwatuzizza e Mmengo mu Bulange ku Lwokubiri. Owek. Mayiga agamba obumulumulu tebuyinza kubulamu naye akakiiko kebyokulonda ka ‘ Independent Electoral and Boundaries Commission’ akakulirwa Wafula Chebukati kakooze ogwako ate tewali bawambiddwa, wadde okusibira abantu mu kiseera kyokunoonya akalulu. “Tewabaddewo kulwana wakati w’enjuyi zombi ezabadde zivuganya, temwabaddemu ttiyaggaasi wadde okumala gakwata abantu abeesimbyewo oba abawagizi babwe era kino tulina okukikoppa, musobola okubaamu obumulumulu,” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Kino kiddiridde okulangirirwa kwa William Samoei Arap Ruto eyafunye ebitundu 50.5% ku buli 100 ku bwapulezidenti nga yawangudde Raila Odinga nafuna ebitundu 48.9 ku 100 gyebabadde naye ku mbiranye. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti omutindo ogwayoleseddwa mu kalulu ke Kenya gwabadde gwamutindo nga ensi endala zisaanye okukopa Owek. Mayiga agamba nti eddembe lya bannamawulire teryalirinyiriddwa nga bwebirabwa mu kulonda okulala nga wano mu Uganda kyagambye nti kyalaze eddaala eddala mu demokulasiya mu bugwanjuba bwa Africa. Abesimbyewo baabadde neddembe lyabwe okutuusa ku bantu baabwe obubaka awatali kukugirwa nakusibwa mu makomera nga nebitongole ebikuumaddembe byalaze obukugu. Wadde waliwo bakamisona 3 namyuka akubiriza okulonda mu Kenya ku byavudde mu kalulu kano, Mukuumaddamula agamba nti akakiiko kebyokulonda ngogyeko obumulumulu obutono kaabadde keerufu mu kubala nokulambika ebyavudde mu kulonda. Okujjako nga Raila Amoro Odinga addukidde mu kkooti okuwakanya ebyavudde mu kalulu kano, William Samoei Arap Ruto waakukuba ebirayiro okukulembera banna Kenya nga pulezidenti owokutaano nga 30 omwezi guno omwaka 2022.

headline: Ekirwadde kya COVID-19 kigobye mu Uganda
text: Minisita w’ebyobulamu Jane Ruth Acheng   Ng’ensi yonna ekyagenda mumaaso n’okugoyebwa ekirwadde kya Coronavirus ekimanyiddwa nga COVID-19, ne mu Uganda kirangiriddwa nti kituuse.  Ku saawa nga 11:30 ez’ekiro, minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’obulamu Jane Ruth Acheng yategeezezza eggwanga nti omusajja ow’emyka 36 eyabadde ava e Dubai mu United Arb Emirates yeyasangiddwa n’ekirwadde kino.  Ono yava mu ggwanga nga Marhc 17 okugenda e Dubai ku nsonga z’obusuubuzi. Bweyekebejjeddwa n’asangibwa nga ayokerera, omusaayi gwamujjiddwako ne gutwalibwa ku Uganda Virus Research Institute gyekyazuuliddwa nti yabadde ne senyiga ono.  Acheng yategeezezza nti omulwadde ono gwatayatuukirizza linnya mutuuze w’e Kibuli mu Kampala era nga kati yatwaliddwa mu ddwaliro ly’e Entebbe gya jjanjjabibwa.  Abasaabaze bonna beyazze nabo ku nnyonyi ya Ethiopian Airlines bonna bagenda kulondoolwa okulaba nga teri alina COVID-19.  Bino webijjidde nga tewanayita yadde olunaku nga Uganda erangiridde nti ensalo zaayo zonna ziggaddwa. Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni eggulo lyaleero era agenda kuddamu okwogerako eri eggwanga ku biki ebirala abantu byebalina okukola okwetangira olumbulege luno.

headline: Essomero lya bakiggala e Masaka lijaguzza okuweza emyaka 15
text: Omukungu Francis Kamulegeya ku kkono ate ku ddyo ye Katikkiro, Charles Peter Mayiga    Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga atenderezza abantu abalina kye bakola okuyamba abalala ng’ekigendererwa sikyakufuna ssente.  Oweek. Mayiga okwogera bino abadde Masaka ng’essomero ly’abaana bakiggala erya Masaka School for the Deaf, liweza emyaka 15 bukyanga litandikibwawo. Essomero lino lyatandikibwa omukungu Francis Kamulegeya wamu ne mwannyina Sophie Kafeero. Abamu ku baana bakiggala “Emirundi mingi tufuna ebirowoozo naye nebisigala mumitima gyaffe. Mbebaza okusobola okussa ekirowoozo ky’okutandika essomero lino mu nkola. Abantu bwebaba balowooza eby’okukola tebalowooleraza mu bino. Batubuuza oba tulina obuyumba bwabapangisa. Abalala basuubula ngoye China, abalala bakuba birango nebafuna ssente empya n’enkadde. Bantu batono nnyo abayinza okulowooza ku kintu kino,” Mayiga bwagambye.  Katikkiro ng’alambuzibwa ebimu ku bintu abaana bye bakola Agasseko nti omuntu atandika ekintu kyatagenda kukolamu magoba, kiraga omutima ogulumirirwa abantu abalala.  “Waliwo abagamba nti ssente ozirina, naye abasinga okuba n’essente bebasinga okuzaagala era bebataagala kufiirwa yadde ekikumi. Bano balina obuggaga mu mitima era tubeebaza nnyo,” Mayiga bwagambye.  Katikkiro ng’asala keeki n’abamu ku baana Ku lulwe, Kamulegeya agambye nti abantu abasukka mu kakadde kamu be batayogera era nga tebawulira nga kyetaagisa abantu bano obutalekebwa mabega.  Abakozi ba CBS, Wycliffe Luyombya asooka ku ddyo ne Abbey Mukiibi ow’okubiri “Abantu bano bagamba nti boogera naye mwe mutawulira, okubeera kiggala tekitegeeza nti tebalina kyebasobola kukola. Abaana abasinga obutayogera, obulemu buno babufuna bamaze kuzaalibwa olw’okufuna omusujja gw’ensiri,” Kamulegeya bwagambye.

headline: NRM ekyekoze ku bifo by’ababaka b’Abavubuka
text: Kampala Ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement kiwangudde ebifo by’ababaka ba bavubuka mu Palamenti ebisinga obungi mu ggwanga mu kulonda kw’eggulo. Wano mu Buganda, Agnes Kirabo yalangiriddwa ng’omuwanguzi era bw’atyo n’ayingira Palamenti okukiikirira ekitundu kino ekya Buganda mu kulonda okwayindidde e Mubende ku ttendekero ly’abasomesa. Agnes Kirabo eyawangudde mu Buganda Kirabo yafunye obululu 780 n’awangula eyali akulira abayizi ku Makerere University, Ivan Bwowe eyabadde talina kibiina n’afuna obululu 85. Mike Katongole yafunye obululu 78, Simon Ssennyonga n’abuukayo n’obululu 49 ate Abdu Kalim Ziritwawula nafuna 9, Joe Javiira 2, ate ye Alvin Ssemambya n’afuna akalulu 1. Okusinziira ku akulira okulonda mu kitundu kya Buganda, Robert Beine yalangiridde Kirabo kuba ye yasinze okufuna obululu obungi. Mu kusooka, akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kaasoose kugoba munnakibiina kya NUP, Moses Kasule mu lwokaano oluvannyuma lw’okukizuula nti yamenya amateeka g’ebyokulonda bwe yasembebwa omuntu omukyamu. Ewalala, Edson Rugumayo owa NRM yawangudde banne okwabadde ne mutabani wa Minisita Beti Kamya ayitibwa Arnold Turwomwe n’awangula obukiise bw’ekitundu kya Western Uganda mu Palamenti. Rugumayo yakung’aanyiza obululu 1,419 ate Turwomwe atalina kibiina n’afuna 402, Adios Beineomugisha (FDC) yafunye 26 , James Kamukama(NUP) n’afuna 3 ate Edwin Muramuzi (Independent) n’afuna 41 olwo Paul Kato ye n’atafunawo kalulu konna. E Mbale, munnakibiina kya NRM Bernard Odoi yawangudde abalala bataano n’afuuka omubaka w’abavubuka mu kitundu kino. Mu mambuka era Munna NRM, Boniface Henry Okot yawangudde be yabadde nabo mu lwokaano. So nga mu kusooka Phiona Nyamutooro yalangiriddwa ng’awangudde eky’omukiise w’abavubuka abawala mu Palamenti. Okusinziira ku tteeka, abavubuka mu ggwanga lyonna bakiikirira ababaka bataano, ku bano bana bava mu bitundu ebyenjawulo ate omubaka w’abavubuka abawala wonna mu ggwanga n’aweza omuwendo gw’abataano.

headline: Sheikh Galabuzi alondeddwa nga Supreme Mufti omuggya
text: Obukulembeze bw’Abayisiraamu obutuula ku kasozi Kibuli, bulonze Sheikh Muhammad Galabuzi nga Supreme Mufti omuggya. Bino birangiriddwa omwogezi w’obukulembeze bw’e Kibuli, Dr. Muhammad Kiggundu bw’abadde ayogerako mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olwaleero ku Mmande. “Okumala akabanga nga tetulina Supreme Mufti, olukiiko lwa bamasheikh abakulu lwatudde okuva ku makya nga lwagala okulabika nti ekintu ekirindirirwa okumala ebbanga eddene kikomekerezebwa nga kwe kulonda Supreme Mufti n’omumyuka we. Ayise mu kakungunta ka bamashiekh abo bonna ye Sheikh Muhammad Galabuzi.” Shiekh Muhammad Lunaanoba Kawooya Okusinziira ku Sheikh Kawooya, Shiekh. Galabuzi aweereddwa abayambi ng’omumyuka we asooka ye Shiekh Ntanda Ibrahim ate owookubiri ye Sheikh Mahdi Kakooza. Ono ategeezezza nti ebifo ebirala bijja kwanjulwa mu lunaku oluddako naye alondeddwa okukulira ebyamateeka ga Sharia, ye Sheikh Abdu Walusimbi era ng’alina obukiiko obulala obumugoberera wansi nga nabwo bujja kulangirirwa.

headline: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okukuuma obuyonjo
text: Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka mu bituindu ebyenjawulo, basabiddwa okukuuma obuyonjo kibayambe okubeera abalamu awamu n’okwewala endwaddde eziva ku bukyamu, bakulaakulane. Owek. Mayanja   nga asimba omuti Okusaba kuno Minista wa Buganda ow’ebyobulimi ne Bulungibwansi, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, y’akukoze ng’atongoza enteekateeka ya Bulungibwansi ey’omuggundu. Okwogwera bino, asinzidde ku Lubiri e Mmengo olwaleero ku Mmande ku mukolo ogwetabiddwako Mmeeya wa Lubaga, Owek. Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwaawo. “Abantu batambula bakasuka ebikongoliro, amagumba, obuveera, obucupa nga tebafaayo nti oba kye bakola kiyinza okubaviirako akabi, kubanga ebikolwa ebyo byonna bibeera butafa ku bulungi bwansi.” Owek. Nkalubo bw’agambye. Minisita Mayanja agasseeko nti ekigendererwa ku mulundi guno kwe kulaba ng’abantu ba Kabaka bongera amaanyi mu kuyooyoota olubiri lw’e Mmengo, nga basimba emiti egiyamba okukuuma obutonde ate nga n’abantu basobole okugiwummuliramu. Owek. Nkalubo alaze ng’Obwakabaka bwe bulina enteekateeka okugabira abantu ba Kabaka mu masaza ag’enjawulo emiti, kiyambe okunnyikiza Bulungibwansi wansi mu bantu.  Asiimye n’Owek. Ssebuggwaawo olw’omulimu amatendo gw’akoze mu kwagazisa abantu enteekateeka eno. Ye mu kwogera kwe, Owek. Ssebuggwaawo alaze ebirungi ebiri mu Bulungibwansi era n’awa amagezi okukolawo ebibiina bya Bulungibwansi nga batandikira mu Lubaga, n’awa n’obweyamo nti ajja kusobola okubikwasizaako. Ssaabasajja Kabaka yawaayo olunaku lw’Ameefuga ga Buganda olwa 8/October olwa buli mwaka lukuzibweko emikolo gya Bulungibwansi okusobola okukulaakulanya abantu n’okutaasa obutonde obutaguddwa ennyo. Mu nteekateeka y’omulundi guno, bannamikago okuli; Naturing Uganda, World Wide Fund for Nature ne Rotary Club- Kampala, bawaddeyo emiti egisoba mu 5,000 gigabibwe mu masaza ag’enjawulo.

headline: Abatakisi mu ppaaka enkadde basobeddwa; ekitundu kitwaliddwa abagagga
text: Abavuzi batakisi mu ppaaka enkadde basobeddwa oluvannyuma lw’abamu ku bamusigansimbi abaali bawaddeyo erimu ku ttaka lyabwe okuli ppaaka eno okulyeddiza olunaku lw’eggulo ku Ssande. Bano abatannasanguzibwa mannya bagamba nti tebaagala takisi kukolera ku ttaka lyabwe era bwebatyo baasimyemu ebinnya n’okuteekamu emisanvu ku kimu ku bitundu ebikola ppaaka eno wakati mu bukuumi obwamaanyi okuva mu poliisi n’amagye. Abamu ku baddeereva bano aboogeddeko ne Gambuuze bagamba nti tebamanyi kigenda kuddako era tebamanyi we bagenda kuzza ssiteegi zaabwe ne basaba gavumenti eteese n’abagagga bano basobole okusigaza emirimu. “Tulina ttiimu erina okukola ku by’okwerinda bya ppaaka eno naye we twogerera tetumanyi gye bali kwe kugamba byonna bizibu.” Omu ku baddeereva bw’ategeezezza. Akulira ekibiina ekitaba abatakisi ekya ‘Federation of Taxi Operators,’Rashid Ssekindiategeezezza Gambuuze ng’erimu ku ttaka lino bweririko bannyini lyo era nga bano bazze n’abasaveya ne batandika okupuntako ekitundu kyabwe. Amyuka omwogeziw’ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA), Robert Kalumbaannyonnyodde nti ekitongole kikola buli kimu okusasula bannannyini ttaka lino emirimu gy’abatakisi giddemu okutambula. “Ppaaka terina gyeraga, tukola buli kimu era njagala okubakakasa nti ettaka ligenda kubaddira ne ppaaka terina gy’eraga.” Kalumba bw’alambuludde. Abamu ku baddereeva bano bagezezaako okuddamu okukolera mu kifo kino ku kifuba wabula poliisi nebakwata nga era nebaggalirwa. Kitegeerekese nti waliwo kkampuni 5 okuli; Lukyamuzi Investments Ltd, DKS Uganda Limited, Key and Ham Investments Limited, Ahabwe Transporters Distributors Limited ne Kabale Distributors Limitedezaawaabira KCCA omwaka oguwedde olw’okusalimbira ku ttaka lyazo wakati nga ppaaka eno egenda mu maaso n’okukolebwa. Ppaaka eno ebadde yaakamala okuggulwawo mu mwezi oguwedde ogwa January 2022 oluvannyuma lw’okumala emyaka ebiri ng’ekolebwa era nga yaamalawo obuwumbi bwa ssiringi za Uganda 4 n’obukadde 300 bulamba.

headline: Musikirize bannamikago beegatte ku mpaka z’amasaza – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Kampala  Katikkiro wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga, akubirizza abateesiteesi b’empaka z’ekikopo ky’amasaza okusikiriza bannamikago abasobola okuteeka ssente mu mpaka ezo. Okwogera bino abadde aggulawo omusomo ogwategekeddwa akakiiko akategeka empaka z’amasaza okusobola okubangula abeenyigira mu nteekateeka z’ekikopo kino oguyindidde ku mutimbagano gwa ZOOM. “Ffe lutindo oluyunga bannamikago eri akatale. Wabula ffe nga bannannyini muzannyo tulina okukakasa nti olutindo lwaffe lunywevu. Tubanoonye, tubalage nti tuli ku mutundo olwo tusobole okubakuuma. Bannamikago bwe baba bajja, bajjira mu njogera y’abaganda egamba nti akuwa gw’owa. Nooolwekyo nkakasa nti abategesi ensonga eyo bajja kugiggyayo bulungi.” Katikkiro Mayigabw’agambye. Katikkiro Mayiga abasabye okumanya obukulu bw’okukuuma bannamikago kubanga kyongera embavu mu mpaka zino nekyongera n’okuyimusa omutindo gw’empaka zino. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti ebimu ku bivaako omukago okusattulukuka kwe kuteetera ne bannamikago abalala naddala abo abavuganya ne munnamukago abeera akoze naawe endagaano, kuba kino kiweebuula endagaano ebeera ekoleddwa. Ono ategeezezza nti abanoonya bannamikago balina okufuba okubalaga we bafuniramu, kibanguyire okuteekamu ensimbi. Mu ngeri yeemu yakkaatirizza obukulu bw’empisa mu muzannyo gw’omupiira n’agamba nti nazo ziyamba okukuuma bannamikago. Okunogaanya kino, yagambye nti bannamikago baba bagumu singa bakizuula nti empisa zibukadde mu abo bonna abeetoolerwako empaka ze babeera bataddemu ensimbi.  Mukuumaddamula Mayiga era asabye abategesi b’empaka z’amasaza okukakasa nti zitegekebwa nga temuli kuweebuula nnono era n’alabula abo abawemulira mu muzannyo guno, okweddako mu bawagizi n’abakulembeze. Katikkiro atenderezza nnyo obukulu bw’empaka zino kubanga zongera okugatta abantu era n’asaba abantu okuzijjumbira. Omusomo guno era gwetabiddwakopulezidenti w’ekibiina ekitwala omupiira mu ggwanga ekya FUFA, Eng. Moses Magogo, minisita w’abavubuka, ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda, Owek. Ssekabembe Kiberu n’abakungu bangi abatuula ku kakiiko akategeka empaka z’amasaza.

headline: Temutambuliza kalulu ku ssente- Minisita Ssekabembe
text: Minisita w’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka eby’emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Ssekabenbe Kiberu, awanjagidde abeesimbyewo okukiikirira abavubuka mu Buganda wamu n’abali mu gavumenti, okwewala okuyingiza ssente mu kalulu kano. Minisita Ssekabembe nga akuutira abavubuka Bino Owek. Ssekabembe abyogeredde ku Masengere bw’abadde aggulawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo wakati w’abavuganya ku kifo ky’omubaka anaakiikirira abavubuka mu kitundu kya Buganda leero ku Mmande. “Temuteeka ssente mu kalulu k’abavubuka kubanga kijja kutta eggwanga. Abalonda mugoberere busobozi kiyambe okufuna abantu abanaakolera eggwanga.” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Owek. Ssekabembe era akuutidde oyo yenna anaabeera eyiseemu okubeera omukozi, yeewale okukozesebwa ate alwanirire enfuga etambulira ku mateeka, abalonzi basobole okumufunamu. Minisita atenderezza omutindo gw’abeesimbyewo n’asuubiza okubanoonya era akolagane nabo kubanga Buganda erina omulimu gw’okuteekateeka abakulembeze naddala abavubuka basobole okuvuganya ku mitendera egy’enjawulo ne Buganda esobole okukula. Minisita Ssekabembe asabye abeesimbyewo okufaayo bakolere abavubuka baleme kulowooza ku kya kwegaggawaza era n’asaba abalonzi okufaayo balonde omuntu anaabakolera nga tebafuddeyo ku ggwanga lyabwe kasita babeera nga bassa ekitiibwa mu Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Ate ye Ssenkulu wa BBS Terefayina, Omuk. Patrick Ssembajjo, agambye nti kino bakikoze okuddiza abantu ababawagidde. Kino bakikoze okulaba nga Buganda efuna omukulembeze eyeeteeseteese obulungi asobole okukolera abantu ba Kabaka. Ye ssentebe wa Buganda Youth Council, Baker Ssejjengo, asabye abeesimbyewo okulondoola embeera y’abavubuka basobole okukyusa obulamu bwabwe nga bamalawo ebbula ly’emirimu wamu n’okutereeza embeera zaabwe. Mu kabbinkano kano, abeesimbyewo okubadde; Kasule Moses owa NUP, Kasumba Gyaviira owa FDC, Ziritwawula Abdul, Mike Katongole, Ivan Bwowe, ne Ssenyonga Simon obwedda basoyebwa ebibuuzo ku nsonga ez’enjawulo. Omubadde ekirina okukolebwa okuzza Buganda ku ntikko, ebyenjigiriza, ebbula ly’emirimu awamu n’obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe olwo ne battunka nga buli omu addamu ekibuuzo. Wabula wadde abavuganya bali 8, babiri ku bano okuli; Alvin Semambya ne Agnes kirabo bo tebalabiseeko. Abeetabye mu kabbinkano kano bategeezezza nga bwe baluubirira okutereeza etteeka erirung’amya okulonda kw’abavubuka, okukola ku bbula ly’emirimu, okukendeereza omusolo ku bayiiya n’abatandisi b’emirimu wamu n’okunyweza obumu, okusobola okutwala Buganda ku ntikko nga banyweza ensonga Ssemasonga naddala eya Federo. Akabbinkano kano kabadde kaweerezebwa butereevu ku BBS Terefayina ne CBS FM era nga kawomeddwamu omutwe aba Buganda Youth Council n’ekitongole kya Nnaabagereka Development Foundation, okufuba okulaba nti abavubuka mu Buganda bafuna obukulembeze obwo bwennyini bwe beetaaga.

headline: Bannamawokota basabiddwa okwongera omutindo ku byebakola
text: Abantu abawangaalira mu ssaza lye Mawokota basabiddwa okulwana bongere omutindo ku bintu eby’enjawulo byebakola kibayambe okweggya mu bwavu basobole okulaakulana nga bafuna akatale k’ebyo byebatunda. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa omwami wa Kabaka akulembera essaza Butambala, Katambala Sulaiman Magala bw’abadde mu mwoleso ogwategekeddwa ku mbuga y’essaza e Butooro mu ggombolola ye Kammengo mu disitulikiti ye Mpigi. “Obuyiiya obw’ekika ekikambwe nti ggwe buli kyolabye ogezaako okukyongerako obuyiiya olwo ate okiggyemu ekirala bwebutyo bwetujja okutambula, ” Katambala Magala bwe yagambye. Omwami wa Kabaka amulamulirako essaza Mawokota, Kayima Gabriel Kabonge nga yakulembeddemu enteekateeka eno asiimye bonna aboolesezza mu mwoleso guno nabonna abataddemu ensimbi okulaba nga gubaawo. Asabye banamawokota okwongera okussa essira mu kutumbula eby’obulambuzi bye Mawokota byongere okuleeta abalambuzi mu ssaza lino nayanjula enteekateeka y’okusimba emmwaanyi yiika 500 ku ssaza mu nteekateeka y’Emmwaanyi Terimba. Akulira ebyobuwangwa n’ennono ku lukiiko lwe ssaza Mawokota Birungi Elizabeth alambuludde ebintu ebiri ku ssaza Mawokota era nasaba Bannamawokota okuwagira enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda. Abolesezza abenjawulo beeyamye okukolera awamu n’Obwakabaka okutumbula ebyobulimi basobole okukyusa ebyenfuna byabwe.

headline: Kyagulanyi alabudde abavvoola Nnamulondo,  agamba si nkola ya NUP
text: Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) alabudde abamu ku bantu abakozesa engoye z’ekibiina kyakulembera okukakanya ekitiibwa kya Nnamulondo nti tagenda kubagumiikiriza. Bobi Wine bino abitadde ku mukutu gwe ogwa Facebook enkya ya leero ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde ayogera ku katambi akalabikidde ku mutimbagano nga omuwala eyeeyita Nalubwama bwebabadde beekalakaasa e Boston mu Amerika. “Newankubadde nga tuwagira abantu baffe okwekalakasa mu ddembe nga bawakanya ebibanyiga byonna, kino kyabade kya buswaavu eri ffenna okulaba Nalubwama nga avvoola Maama Nabagereka ne Katikkiro,” Bobi Wine bw’agambye. Kyagulanyi asabye abantu bonna mu ggwanga okutunuulira ebikolwa bino nga eby’obuntu ssekinoomu kuba si nkola wadde endowooza ya NUP n’ekisinde ki People Power. Ono avumiridde enneeyisa eno era nalabula abawagizi babwe ababadde beenyigira mu bikolwa bino okubikomya bunnabiro kuba kiweebula ekitiibwa. “Abalabe baffe baagala kulaba nga twetemyemu ebiwayi awo balyoke basobole okutufuga nga tetusobola kwegatta kubalwanyisa. Nsaba bonna abavoola ennono nga bambadde ebyambalo byaffe bakikomye amangu ddala,” Kyagulanyi. Bobi Wine agamba nti abantu abakola ebikolwa ebivoola embuga balina ebigendererwa byabwe okulaga nti ekibiina ki National Unity Platform kya bulabe eri Buganda ekitali kituufu. Bino Webijjidde nga Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, yakamala okusaba abavubuka okukozesa obulungi emitimbagano era beewale okutyoboola abalala era nasaba abo bonna abaagala okumanya amawulire amatuufu agafa embuga okukozesa emikutu emitongole era beewale okutwala engambo eziri ku mitimbagano.

headline: Teri kuva waka; Museveni eggwanga aligadde lwa COVID-19
text: Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni akawungeezi kaleero ayisizza ebiragiro ebikambwe okusobola okuziyiza okusaasaana kw’akawuka ka kolona.  Mubiragiro byayisizza kwekuli okuyimiriza emmotoka zonna okutambula okuleka ez’ebitongole by’ebyowkerinda, wamu ne ambulensi.  Museveni are alangiridde kafyu mu ggwanga lyonna okuza saawa emu eya kawungeezi okutuuka emu ey’olweggulo, ng’abantu abo bokka abakkirizibwa okutambula beebo abakola mu bitontgole ebirekeddwawo wamu n’abatunda mu maduuka g’eby’okulya.  Amaduuka gonna agatunda ebitali byakulya galagiddwa okuggalawo ssaako galagi za mmotoka wamu ne saluuni okumala ennaku 14.  “Akawuka kano kazibu nnyo, tetuyinza kukkakiriza kusaasaana kubanga tetujja kusobola kukajjanjjaba,” Museveni bweyagambye. Yagasseeko nti ekimukozesezza kino bwebutagoberera biragiro nga bweyabiyisa.  Yagambye bweyalangirira emmotoka z’olukale zonna okukomya okutwala abantu, abalina ez’obwannayini nebasalawo okuzifuula ez’okutambuza abantu.  Museveni yaweze ne bannabyabufuzi okusondera abantu emmere n’alagira poliisi ebakwate ebagguleko ogw’okugezaako okutta abantu. Yayongeddeko nti gavuemntiye egenda kugabira abantu abatalina byakulya emmere omuli akawunga, ebijaanjaalo, amata n’ebirala.  Museveni era yagambye nti bagenda kwogeraganyaamu ne zi banka wamu n’amakampuni agakola ku masanyalaze wamu n’amazzi okulaba ng’abantu tebasalibwako lwamabanja.  Omuwendo gw’abantu abalina kolona mu ggwanga guweze 33.

headline: Poliisi Erabudde Aba Boda Boda Obutagezaako Kulumba Maka Ga Mukulembeze W’eggwanga
text: Omwogezi wa Poliisi Patrick Onyango  Poliisi mu Kampala erabudde abagoba ba boda boda obutagezaako kulumba maka g’omukulembeze w’eggwanga nga bwebateeseteese singa tebakkirizibwa kuddamu kukola. Bwabadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire ku kitebe ky’essengejjero ly’amawulire ga gavumenti, Patrick Onyango omwogezi wa Poliisi ya Kampala n’emirirwano yategeezezza nti singa aba boda boda baagala gavumenti eddemu okubakkiriza okutikka abantu wamu n’okukola okusukka essaawa ekkumi n’emu, balina kuteeseganya so si sikwekalakaasa. “Twakitegeddeko nti aba boda boda abasukka 5000 bagenda kwekunga balumbe State House, naye tubalabula nti tetujja kufunya mikono nga tubalaba bamenya amateeka. Tuli beetegefu okukuuma ekibuga kino wamu n’eggwanga lyonna,” Onyango bweyategeezezza. Ono yayongeddeko nti era waliwo n’aba boda boda abalala abatandise okulumba eb’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda. Yawadde eky’okulabirako eggulo aba boda boda 80 bwebaagezezzaako okulumba abasirikale abali mu Lubigi.  Abasirikale baakubye amasasi mu bbanga era baasobodde okukwatako aba boda boda bana wamu ne pikipiki zaabwe ng’era kati bakuumibwa ku Poliisi ya Kampala Mukadde.

headline: 50 bakwatiddwa lwa kujeemera biragiro bya COVID19
text: Kampala Poliisi mu Kampala ekutte abantu abasoba mu 50 , bano basangiddwa nga bakungaanidde mu nnyumba emu nga banywa omwenge ekintu ekikontana n’ebiragiro bya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu ku kirwadde ki COVID19. Poliisi nga esazeeko ebbaala ya Nomads Okusinziira ku mwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emirilaano Luke Owoyesigire, ekikwekweto kino bakikoze ku Ssande ku ssaawa ssatu ez’ekiro. Owoyesigire yagambye nti, batemezeddwako ogumu ku mikutu gy’amawulire oluvanyuma lw’ abatuuze okwemulugunya ku bantu abawerako abakungaanira munnyumba emu ku kyalo Balintuma nebeekatankira omwenge n’okuleekanya ebidongo. Ebikolwa bya bano bibadde bimazeeko abantu mu kitundu kino emirembe era nga bisobola okuvaako ekirwadde ki COVID19. Abakwate bakuumirwa ku Poliisi ya Kira Road era nga bagenda kubavunaana okujeemera amateeka wamu n’okwetaba mu bikolwa ebiyinza okusaasaanya ekirwadde ki COVID19. Poliisi era yazinzeeko ebbaala ya Nomads e Bunga nekwata abantu 49 abasangiddwa nga bali mu kunywa . Owoyesigire yategeezezza nti bano okuli nnanyini bbaala ya Nomads Fred Kamau ne bamaneja 8 bakuumirwa ku poliisi ye Kabalagala . Bino webigidde nga omuwendo gw’abantu abakwatibwa ekirwadde kino gweyongera buli kadde, abakugu kyebagamba nti kivudde ku butafaayo ku mateeka ga COVID19.

headline: Abantu abalala bataano basangiddwa ne COVID-19
text: Dr Henry Mwebesa  Buli lukya ekirwadde kya COVID-19 kyeyongera okusaasaana mu ggwanga nga owesomera bino, abalwadde baweze 14.  Okusinziira ku akulira eby’obulamu mu minisitule y’ebyobulamu Dr Henry Mwebesa, kubataano abaazuuliddwa n’obulwadde, kuliko n’omwana ow’emyezi omunaana ng’ono kigambibwa ekirwadde yakijja ku kitaawe abadde yakava e KIsumu mu Kenya.  Omwana yakwatibwa essujja ery’amanyi n’addusibwa mu ddwaliro era okwekebejjebwa ng’alina ekirwadde kino.  Mwebesa yagambye nit waliyo ne Munnayuganda ow’emyka 57 omutuuze w’e Adjumani mu bukiika kkono bw’eggwanga naye eyasangiddwa n’ekirwadde kino.  Ono ye tannafulumako ggwanga newankubadde akolera ku nsalo ya Uganda ne South Sudan. Omulala Munnayuganda eyabadde ava e Germany naateekebwa mu kalantiini gyeyalagidde obubonero bw’obulwadde buno era mu kukeberebwa n’asangiba n’ekirwadde kino.  Ate ababiri Bachina abaakwatibwa e Zombo wiiki ewedde bwebaatoloka mu kalantiini.  Abantu abasoba 435,000 bebaakakwatibwa ekirwadde kino ata abalala 19618 bakkiridde ezzirakumwa mu nsi yonna.

headline: Kyagulanyi agamba akalulu kaddemu kabalibwe bw’aba Museveni agamba kabbibwa
text: Akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, ayagala akalulu kaddemu okubalibwa bw’aba nga Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni naye akkiriza nti Kyagulanyi yabba akalulu nga bw’agamba. Akulira ekibiina kya NUP, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu Kyagulanyi asinzidde ku kitebe ky’ekibiina kye e Kamwokya leero ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire oluvannyuma lwa poliisi okubakwata olunaku lw’eggulo nga babanja abantu baabwe, abaawambibwa okuyimbulwa. “Byampuna bannayuganda bannange era bisesa Mw. Museveni mu butaswala yagamba nti ffe twabba akalulu. Bw’aba byayogera ng’abikakasa nga tebyamusimattuse, awo akakasa kye tubadde twogera nti okulonda tekwali kw’amazima na bwenkanya.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti beetaaga okuddamu okwetegereza n’okubala ebyava mu kalulu era kino kye babadde basaba ebbanga lyonna era emu ku nsonga lwaki baali bagenze mu kkooti wadde eno nayo yalaga kyekubiira. “Naye engeri gy’avuddeyo naye n’akakasa nti okulonda tekwali kw’amazima, lwaki takkiriza netukuba ttooci mu kulonda okwo oba ne tuddayo mu bunnya.” Bobi Wine bw’ategeezezza. Ku bigambo bya Museveni mw’agambira nti aba NUP bategeka okutta abantu baabwe bavumaganye gavumenti, Kyagulanyi agamba nti kino si kigambo kitono naye bakimanyi nti buno bwe bumu ku bukodyo aba NRA bwe baali bakozesa mu nsiko. Bw’atyo alabudde Museveni okutagezaako kubalumbagana kuba ye n’amagye ge be bazze bakola ebikolwa bino. Ssentamu ategeezezza nti wadde abamu ku bakulembeze ne bannaddiini baasabye bateeseganye ne Pulezidenti Museveni okumalawo obunkenke, tebagenda kubaako nteeseganya zonna ze bayingiramu kuba tewali nsonga ya kuteesaako. Ono agamba nti bannayuganda bangi battiddwa era omusaayi gwa bano guli ku ngalo za Pulezidenti Museveni n’abaduumira ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda mu ggwanga. Bobi Wine annyonnyodde nti waliwo ekiwandiiko kye babaze okutwalira Ssaabaduumizi w’amaggye lya UPDF, Gen. David Muhoozi, nga babanja abantu baabwe abaawambibwa amagye era kino Museveni yakikasa bwe yagamba nti amagye ge gaabakwata. Kyagulanyi akunze bannayuganda kuno n’ebunaayira okwekalakaasa era balwanirire eddembe lyabo abakyali mu busibe kuba tebalina musango okuggyako ensonga z’ebyobufuzi. “Eryo ddembe lyammwe okwekalakaasa mu mirembe kuba Ssemateeka agamba nti singa omuntu aneekalakaasa mu mirembe abeera talina tteeka ly’amenye.” Kyagulanyi bw’annyonnyodde. Ku nsonga y’ebyenfuna Kyagulanyi agamba nti kafyu w’ekiro talina makulu kyokka ng’eremesezza bannayuganda okukola era bangi ne balemwa okuzza abaana baabwe ku masomero. Naye bino byonna abakola olw’ ebyobufuzi nga yeekwese mu Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: Buganda yakukolagana n’aba Global Social Economy Forum okugoba obwavu mu bantu ba Kabaka.
text: Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka era Minisita w’Eby’emirimu n’Obuyiiya, Prof. Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, asisinkanye president w’ekibiina kya Global Social Economy Forum Joungu Youl Kim ne Secretary General, Laurence Kwark, okutema empenda ez’okutumbulamu eby’enfuna by’abantu nga bayita mu nkola y’obwegassi.  Omumyuka wa Katikkiro Asooka  Owek. Dr Twaha Kawaase  ali wamu ne pulezidenti  w’ekibiina kya Global Social Economy Forum Joungu Youl Kim ne Secretary General Laurence Kwark mu nsisisnkano gye babaddemu ku Bulange. Bano bakulembeddwamu mayor wa Nakawa Ronald Balimwezo n’owa Lubaga Joyce Nabbosa Ssebugwawo.Mu kwogera kwe, owek Twaha Kaawaase agambye nti Buganda erina ebiruubirirwa byetambulizaako ensonga era enteekateeka ya Global Social EconomY Forum eri butereevu mu kiruubirirwa eky’okulaba nti obwakabaka bujja abantu baabwo mu bwavu,buyingiza ensimbi, budda ku ntikko, ate n’okulaba nti n’abavubuka bakwatibwako era kino kikolebwa nga buyita mu makubo ag’enjawulo omuli bulungibwansi omuyitibwa okumaakuma abantu olwo nebeenyigira mu mirimu gy’obwakabaka nekisobozesa buganda okukula. Mayor wa Nakawa, Ronald Balimwezo agambye nti enkola y’obwegassi eyambye nnyo eggwaga lya korea okulaakulana era singa enywezebwa wano mu buganda kijja kuyambako abantu ba buganda okuva mu bwavu.Mayor Balimwezo agambye nti enkola y’okusimba omuti mu mikolo gy’okwanjula, yeemu kwezo ejjayo obutereevu ebigendererwa by’ekibiina kino. headline: Abasambi 13 bavudde mu Vipers SC
text: Abasambi 13 beebavudde mu ttiimu ya Vipers SC wakati nga ttiimu ez’enjawulo zeeteekateeka okuddamu okulwanira ekikopo mu Uganda Premier League sizoni ejja. Abamu ku basambi abavudde mu Vipers SC Okusinziira ku kibanja kya ttiimu eno ku mutimbagano , abamu ku basambi abateereddwa endagaano zabwe zibadde ziweddeko ate nga abalala bakkiriziganyiza ne ttiimu batambulemu. Obubaka obuli ku mutimbagano (Website) gwa ttiimu eno bulaze nti, “ Vipers SC ekakasizza nga abasambi abawerako bwebavudde mu ttiimu eno wakati mukukiriziganya kiyambe omutendesi Fred Kajoba okutegeka ttiimu erina okusamba sizoni ejja.” Ku bano kuliko; omusambi Brian Nkuubi abadde ku kiraabu eno okuva mu 2015 bwebamugula okuva mu Kira Young, Omukwasi wa ggoolo Derrick Ochan, Dan Barikiwulira,  Janjali Joseph, Dickens Okwir, Ibrahim Kiyemba ne Duncan Seninde.  Abalala kuliko; Farouk Musisi, Tom Masiko, Steven Mukwala , Tito Okello, Fred Atuhwera ne Baden Mujahid.  Vipers esuubira okuwaayo omusambi Brian Kalumba ku bbanja wadde nga tekinamanyika ttiimu ki emutwala. Bino webigidde nga Vipers yamaze okufuna abasambi  abapya omuli; Disan Galiwango okuva mu Express, Ibrahim (Mbarara City), Jamil Kalisa (Bright Stars) ne David Bagoole (Busoga United)  bagiyambe okwenyweza mu sizoni ejja.  Sizoni eyaggwa Vipers yamalira mukifo kisooka ne n’obubonero 54 nga yasinza ku KCCA FC obubonero buna (4) okusitukira mu kikopo kya liigi.

headline: Paasita Kyazze asabidde Bobi Wine awangule akalulu
text: Omusumba wa Omega Healing Center esangibwa e Namasuba omanyiddwa nga Michel Kyazze, awonze Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu abangi gwe bayita Bobi Wine mu mikono gya Katonda era n’amusabira okuwangula akalulu k’obwapulezidenti akagenda okulondebwa nga 14 omwezi guno.   Omusumba Kyazze akakasizza Kyagulanyi olw’ebyo by’akola mbu birimu ekigambo kya Katonda nti era biri mu mateeka. “Mukama agenda kukuwa ekisa obeere mugumu ebintu ne bwe binaabeera bikakali. Tolina kibi ky’okoze okuyimirirawo ku lw’ekyo ky’okkiririzaamu.” Kyazze bwe yategeezezza Kyagulanyi. Omusumba era yasabye abeetabye mu kusaba kuno beenyigire mu kulonda ate balondese magezi okusobola okutwala eggwanga mu maaso. Bino byabaddewo ku Ssabbiiti eyasoose mu mwaka guno, akwatidde NUP bbendera mu kuvuganya ku ntebe y’eggwanga bwe yasazeewo okusabira mu kkanisa eno ng’akoowoola omwoyo wa Mukama amukwatizeeko ku kiruubirirwa kye. Mu kwogera kwe, Kyagulanyi yasoose kutendereza Musumba Kyazze olw’okumukkiriza okwetaba mu kusaba n’agamba mbu bangi bamugobaganyizza olwekyo ky’ali. “Sigumu si ebiri, emirundi mingi ng’enze mu makanisa ag’enjawulo nga bansibira bweru era ng’abasumba bagamba mbu tebayinza kusabira wamu nange. Nkwebaza olw’okunnyaniriza.” Kyagulanyi bwe yategeezezza Omusumba. Kyagulanyi yasoomoozezza abakulu b’amadiini abasaba bannayuganda okukuuma emirembe mu kalulu mbu bannansi ba Uganda tebayinza kukuuma mirembe nga waliwo obutali bwenkanya obukolebwa eri abantu be buli lukya. “Njagala mpozzi ate tusabire obwenkanya. Tewayinza kubaawo mirembe nga tewali bwenkanya. Nandyagadde okulaba abatukulira mu madiini nga bavumirira obutali bwenkanya obututuusibwako buli lunaku, mu ekyo buli omu ajja kuba n’emirembe. Tetuli bakaliffujjo.” Kyagulanyi bwe yayongeddeko. Kyagulanyi bwe yabadde agenda e Namasuba, emmotoka ze zaasisinkanye n’oluseregende lw’emmotoka za Pulezidenti Museveni era abawagizi be ne basakanyiza waggulu nga bwe bayimba eng’ombo za NUP wamu n’okumusuuta wabula tewali mbeera y’amaanyi yateereddwawo. Ku lunaku lwa bbalaza Kyagulanyi asuubirwa okugenda mu buvanjuba bwa Uganda okuperereza abeeyo okumuwa obululu wadde ng’abasinga ku abo b’atambula nabo bakyali mu mikono gya poliisi.

headline: Abakulembeze bakubiriziddwa okuyiga okuta obuyinza g’Omulabirizi w’e Mityana atuuzibwa
text: Reverend Dr James Bukomeko atuuziddwa ng’omulabirizi w’obulabirizi bw’e Mityana ku kkanisa ya St Andrews Church e Namukozi.  Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asinzidde wano n’akubiriza abakulembe ku mitendera egy’enjawulo okuyiga okuwaayo obukulembeze mu mirembe eri abantu abalala.  “Akalombolombo k’okukyusa obukulembeze kalungi nga twerekereza netukwasa abalala. Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali temulaba ng’akyali muto naye yeerekereza. Tweyongera okukulaakulana kubanga bulyomu ajja n’ebirowoozo bye,” Mayiga bwagambye.  Bukomeko okulondebwa ku ky’obulabirizi kyaddirira okulondebwa kwabaddae Omulabirizi Dr Steven Kazimba Mugalu nga Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda.  Omulabirizi Dr James Bukomeko Ono agenda kuddira Ssaabalabirizi Stanely Ntagali mu bigere agenda okuwummula emirimu omwezi ogujja oluvanyuma lw’okuweza emyaka 65 egyassalirwa okubeera omulabirizi.  Mayiga agambye nti omuntu okulondebwa ku kifo ky’obukulembeze aba afunye obuvunanyizibwa bunene obujja n’okusoomoozebwa.  Omulabirizi Bukomeko ne baminisita, Kyewalabye Male  asooka ku kkono ne Joseph Kawuki “Omulabirizi Bukomeko tumulinamu essuubi ddene nti agenda okuyitimusa obulabirizi bw’e Mityana mu by’omwoyo n’omubiri,” Mayiga bwagambye. Agasseeko nti buli webabeera ku nsonga z’eddiini kiba kizibu nnyo obutogera ku Bwa Kabaka, n’ategeeza nti engeri eddiini yaabagoberezi ba Kulisito gyeyajjamu ye yasaawo omukago n’Obwakabaka ng’era kyetaagisa okugukuuma.  Omulabirizi Bukomeko n’omuyuka wa Katikkiro asooka  Oweek. Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase “Obuwangwa n’ennono mu mulembe Omutebi kitegeeza abantu abalina emmere gyebalya abantu abalamu obulungi, abettanira eby’enjigiriza, abantu abalina ke bayingiza , abantu abeeyagalira mu ddembe lyabwe eryo’bwebange, abavubuka abalina emirimu gyebakola. Nina essuubi ddene nti nga Bukomeko yemulabirizi w’e Mityana, omukago oguluubirirwa okukola ebyo gujja kutinta tuzze Buganda ku ntikko,” Mayiga bwagambye.  Omulabirizi ne Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga Ku lulwe, Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ayozaayozezza Bukomeko wamu n’abakulistaayo b’e Mityana olw’okufuna omulabirizi omujja.  Mu bubakabwe obwamusomeddwa Ssaabaminisita Dr Livingstone Ruhakana Rugunda, Museveni, era yasiimye Olukiiko lw’abalabirizi olw’okulonda Dr Bukomeko ng’omulabirizi. Omulabirizi ne Baminista ba Kabaka eb’enjawulo “Oweereddwa obuvunanyizibwa bw’okulungamya abantu ba Katonda mu mpisa ennungi wano ku nsi wamu n’okubateekateeka okwefunira Obwakabaka bwa Katonda obutaggwaawo. Nkakasa nti Omulabirizi Bukomeko ajja kutambulira mu buufu bw’abo abamusooka,” Museveni bwagambye  Asabye bannaddiniobutenyigira mu byakulyowa myoyo kyokka kubanga Yesu Kulisito sikyeyasomesa kyokka wabula n’obwetaavu bwa bantu obw’okunsi.  Ssaabalabirizi Ntagli  ku kkono ng’ayanjula Omulabirizi Bukomeko “Nkubiriza ekkanisa okukubiriza abantu okwenyigira mu nteekateeka za gavumenti ezigendereddwamu okugoba obwavu naddala mu maka,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Kululwe, Dr Bukomeko yeeyamye okukolagana obulungi n’abantu bonna e Mityana okusobola okutumbula enkulaakulana wamu n’obumu.  Omukolo gwetabiddwako bannadiini okuva mu nzikiriza ez’enjawulo okwabadde ne Ssabasumba Dr Cyprian Kizito Lwanga.

headline: Abali ebunaayira mwenyigire mu bukulembeze gye muli – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Kampala Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira ku mawanga ebunaayira, okwenyigira mu bukulembeze mu bitundu gye bali era bafeeyo n’okubaako kye basiga ku butaka, kiyambe okukulaakulanya Nnyaffe Buganda. Katikkiro Mayiga nga alambika bannyuganda ababeera ebweru “Enkulaakulana ya Buganda ne Uganda tegenda kujjawo nga kya magero oba entuuko, naye tujja kukulaakulana nga tutegedde embeera mwe tuli era tusale amagezi agagwanidde ku bizibu bye tulimu,” Mayiga bwe yagambye. Bino Katikkiro abyogedde aggalawo ttabamiruka w’abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira e Bulaaaya mu Bungereza n’amawanga ga Scandanvian, eyayindidde ku mutimbagano gwa ZOOM eggulo ku Lwomukaaga. Owek. Mayiga yabasabye banyweze obumu ng’abantu abava mu Buganda abawangaalira ebunaayira bakolere wano, kibayambe okwekulaakulanya wamu nkubaako bye bakola eka ku butaka nga batumbula embeera z’abantu abaasigala kuno, kibayambeko okugoba obwavu. “Osobola okutereka ssente n’ebibiina by’Obwakabaka nga Ssuubi lyo Zambogo SACCO, bino nabyogerako mu July era mukozese emikisa Obwakabaka gye butaddewo okusigamu ensimbi ng’Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa bwe yabalaze,” Mayiga bwe yabasabye. Yeebazizza abantu ba Kabaka bano olw’okuvaayo okwenyigira mu lutalo lw’okukulaakulanya Obuganda era n’ategeeza nti kaweefube gwe baliko naddala ebyobulamu, y’ensonga lwaki baaweereddwa engule era ne Beene n’asiimibwa okukulemberamu olutabaalo ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya. Katikkiro Mayiga yategeezezza abali ebunaayira nti balagidde abalonzi balonde abo abavuddeyo ku nsonga za Buganda era abanaasobola okukulaakulanya Uganda n’ebirowoozo ebizimba. Kaweefube ono yeetabiddwamu bannaminisita bakabaka bonna okubadde ow’ebyobulamu, ow’ebyensimbi, ow’ebyobulimi n’abalala nga bano bateeseza ku nsonga ez’enjawulo ezisobola okukyusa obulamu bw’abantu ba Beene. Omumyuka owookubiri owa Katikkiro era omuwanika, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, yalambise abantu b’Omutanda abali ebunaayira, we balina okusiga ensimbi mu Bwakabaka ne Uganda, basobole okukulaakulana. Ate ye Minisita w’ebyobulamu, Owek. Prosperous Nankindu, yalaze ebimu ku bintu Minisitule ye by’etuuseeko okukuuma abantu ba Kabaka nga balamu era n’abalaga n’ebyo bye basuubira okukola. Minisita w’ensonga z’abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira ebweru, Owek. Joseph Kawuki, yalaze obwetaavu bw’okutuusa obukulembeze wansi mu bantu mu masaza gano ag’ebweru era n’alaga n’enteekateeka Obwakabaka gye bulina okwongera okubakulaakulanya.

headline: NUP eyodde ebifo byonna mu kibuga Mukono
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Ekibiina kya National Unity Platform mu kibuga Mukono kyeyogedde okweriisa enkuuli bwe kikukumbye ebifo ebisinga obungi mu lukiko lwa Munisipaali eno nga bawagulidde ddala okuviira ddala ku ky’obwammeeya mu kulonda okwa Mmande ate NRM nefunayo ebifo bbiri byokka. Erisa Mukasa Nkoyoyo n’abamu Ku bakansala abawangudde. Ekifo kya mmeeya kyawanguddwa abadde Ssentebe wa Goma Division, Erisa Mukasa Nkoyoyo owa NUP nga yafunye obululu 18088, yaddiriddwa munna NRM, Nabatanzi Daisy Sarah Ssonko 5126, Kaddu Christopher 2231, Kyamaggwa Stephen 1148, Sserugga Sirajje 974, Mulimira Micdad 907, Lugoloobi Daniel 763, Mpalanyi Christopher 190 ne Mutyaba Mathew 70. Bano beekokkodde ebikolwa by’okwagala okugulirira abalonzi ssaako n’okutiisibwa be bagambye nti baabadde ba NRM naye bakoze ekisoboka okuwagula. Mu kwogerako gye bali, omubaka w’ekibuga kino, Hon. Betty Bakireke Nambooze asabye abaalondeddwa okukola ekibalondesezza kuba omupiira guli mu ngalo zaabwe nga basaanye okukola ku ebizibu ebiruma abantu. Okulonda we kwaggweeridde nga NRM erinayo abakiise 5 nga 2 baliko obulemu, 2 bakadde.

headline: Omusumba Elvis Mbonye atiisizzatiisizza okukuba poliisi mu mbuga
text: Omusumba Elvis Mbonye Omusumba wa Balokole, Elvis Allan Mbonye, agambye akooye poliisi okulinnyirira eddembe lye ery’obuntu olw’okumuyita olutatadde okugenda ku kitebe kyayo okuzza obujja akakalu ke yamuwa. Nga 28 Mukulukusabitungotungo, Mbonye yayitibwa ku poliisi annyonnyole lwaki yali alemesa enteekateeka ya gavumenti kukugemesa okwekikungo abaana abali wansi w’emyaka 15 olukusense, Rubella ne Polio. Kigambibwa nti ag’ayita ku mukutu gwe ogwa Facebook Mbonye yagamba nti eddagala erigema lyali lyabulabe eri abaana. Wabula Bannamateekaabe bwebaalabikako ku kitebe kya Poliisi ekola kukunonyereza ku buzzi bw’esmisnago, bategeeza nti Mbonye si yeyali awandiise obubaka obwo kubanga erinnya lyakozesa liri Prophet Elvis Allan Mbonye so Mugisha Elvis Mbonye eyali awandiisi. Mu bbaluwa gyawandiikidde akulira ekitongole ekikola kukunonyereza kubuzzi bw’emisango muggwanga, Grace Akullo, nga ayitira mu bannamateekaabe, aba Walyemera and CO Advocates, Mbonye agambye nti akooye okwewuuba ku poliisi okuzza obujja akakalu, ng’ate bakimanyi bulungi omusango gwe bamuvunaana siyeeyaguzza. Agamba ati abasirikale abakola ku fayiroye bwagezaako okubabuuza ekigenda mumaaso bamuzzaamu bukambwe oluusi nebasuubiza n’okumusiba. “Kakati ggwe nga akulira ekitongole kino twagala oyingire munsonga eno okusobola okukomekereza okunonyereza okutakoma,” Ebbaluwa ya Mbonye bwegamba. Yagasseeko nti singa ensonga ye tekolwako agenda kukola ekisoboka kyonna okulaba nga eddembe lye terigenda mumaaso nga lityoboolwa. Mukwogerako ne bannamawulire, munnamateeka wa Mbonye Dan Walyemera yagambye nti kirabika ekigendererwa kya poliisi kyakutulugunya muntuwe. “Tugenda kutwala abo abasirkale abeeraze nti ekigenderwa kyabwe kyatulugunya Mbonye mu kooti. Ekirungi kati tulina etteeka erikola ku basirikale abatulugunya abantu,” Walyemera bweyagambye.

headline: Ab’e Ssembabule beemulugunyiza ku kuyimiriza okulonda kwa bammeeya ne bassentebe
text: Ssembabule Abatuuze n’abavuganya ku bifo by’obwakkansala ku disitulikiti ye Ssembabule beemulugunyiza ku kakiiko k’ebyokulonda mukitundu kino okwongerayo okulonda. Akulira eby’okulonda mu disitulikiti ye Ssembabule, Mbaine Robert Olunaku lw’eggulo bano baakedde mubifo webalina okulondera era nga n’abebyokwerinda babadde bataka ku bifo bino okulabanga abantu balonda abakulembeze baabwe mu mirembe. Abamu ku bavuganya okuli; Sisiro Joseph Salongo Joseph, Umar Maseruka kwosa ne Wuudu Sebalamu bagambye nti entabwe yavudde ku kakiiko k’ebyokulonda okuddibaga amannya n’obubonero bw’abeesimbyewo nga owa NUP bamuwadde kabonero ka bbaasi ekireseewo okutabulwa. Bano bategeezezza nti kino kibayisizza bubi kuba babadde bamaze dda okusasula abantu baabwe abalina okukuuma akalulu nga kati balina kuddamu kubasasula nate. Balayidde okulumba abakakiiko kabaliyirire ensimbi zaabwe zebamaze edda okusaasaanya era nebasaba akakiiko okuteekawo olunaku olulala era balulange abantu basobole okulutegeera. Wabula ate abamu ku batuuze okuli Fred Lubuto era beekokodde amagye amangi agaleeteddwa mukitundu kyabwe okukuuma akalulu nga bagamba nti akalulu k’obwakkansala kandibeeramu ebirumira. Wakati wa bino byonna ye Patrick Nkalubo eyeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya NRM agamba nti banne tebalina kutya olw’ensobi ezabaddewo nabasaba okwesiga akakiiko wadde nga asuubira okuwangula munne Jjugu Migadde bwebali mu kalulu kano. Ate ye akulira okulonda mu disitulikiti eno, Mbaine Robert yakakasizza nga bwebaliko kyebakola okutereeza embeera wadde nga tamanyi lunaku lutongole akalulu lwekagenda kubaawo kyokka nga yasabye abantu okusigala nga bagumikiriza.

headline: Mudde tuteese, DP eyise abagiddusemu
text: Ekibiina kya Democratic Party (DP) kitegeezezza nga bwe kitandise kaweefube w’okunoonya bannakibiina bonna abaali baatwalibwa omuyaga gw’ebyobufuzi wabula n’eyo gye baddukira nebayisibwa nga eky’okutale, nti beetegefu okubaaniriza. Abamu ku babaka abaava mu DP Okusinziira ku bakulu mu kibiina kino, bannakibiina bangi baafuna obutakkaanya n’abakulu era nebakivaamu nga kaweefube ono atuumiddwa ‘KOMAWO EKA’ okusobola okuzza ekibiina kino engulu wakati nga beetegekera akalulu ka 2021. Kinajjukirwa nti ababaka abawerako abeegattira mu kisinde kya DP Bloc baddukira mu kibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) ekikulemberwa Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi nga balumiriza Ssenkaggale Nobert Mao okubayisaamu amaaso n’okuyisaamu ssemateeka w’ekibiina olugaayu. Kaweefube ono alangiriddwa omwogezi wa DP omuggya Okoler Opio Lo Amanu mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olwa buli wiiki leero ku Lwokubiri wano mu Kampala. “Tutandise kaweefube nga tumuyise Komawo eka weebake eri baganda baffe abamu abaagenda nga batya okudda nti tetugenda kubaaniriza. Naye ffe tutandise kaweefube okubakimayo yonna gye baddukira.” Okoler Opio bw’agambye. Opio ategeezeza nti abaava mu DP gyebaalaga embeera mwe bayisibwa si nnungi wabula nga bo nga DP tebabagobangako bw’atyo n’abasaba badde eka kubanga eno ye waabwe. Ono annyonnyodde nti bannaabwe gye baalaga tebeetaaya era nga kibabeeredde kizibu okwegazanyiza mu by’obufuzi by’ebibiina gye baalaga. Balina okukimanya nti DP ebirowoozo byabwe ebimanyi era ebyaniriza era nneetegefu okubawuliriza. Ekibiina kino kyasinzidde mu lukung’aana luno nekinenya Pulezidenti Museveni ku kiragiro kyeyawa nga kiggulawo amasizinzo bwe yakkiriza abantu 70 bokka mu buli Ssinzizo n’etegeeza nti waakiri Museveni yandikkirizzaako ebitundu 50 ku buli 100, abantu nebasobola okuweebwa eddembe ly’okusinza. “Pulezidenti yagamba nti mu buli Ssinzizo mubeeremu abantu nsavu naye ffe nga aba DP tulowooza nti ekyo si kya bwenkanya kubanga amasinzizo gano omuwendo gw’abantu abatulamu si gwe gumu. Ekkanisa y’e Namirembe w’eba etuuza abantu 2000, leka etuuze ekitundu ky’abo nga bwekyakolebwa bwe yali aggulawo entambula y’olukale.”Okoler Opio b’agambye. Okoler Opio era akungubagidde eyaliko Mmeeya wa Kampala,Al- Hajji Nasser Ntege Sebaggala eyafudde ku Lwomukaaga lwa wiiki ewedde. Ategeezezza ng’ono bw’ali omu ku basajja abaayimirirawo okuzimba ekibiina kya DP. Atenderezza omulimu ogwakolebwa Sebaggala bweyavaayo n’alaga abantu nti basobola okwekkiririzaamu era nebasobola okubeera ekyo kye baagala.

headline: Abeegwanyiza ku bwapulezidenti bakaaba, abalonzi basaba ssente okubawa emikono
text: Abeegwanyiza okutwala obwapulezidenti bw’eggwanga ebintu bitandise okubatabukako oluvannyuma lw’abalonzi abalina okubawa emikono egibasemba okwesimbawo okubasaba ssente, ze bagamba nti tebazirina ekiwalirizza n’abamu okudduka mu lwokaano. Pulezidenti Museveni yomu ku beesibyewo Bano abasoba mu 82 olwafuna empapula ez’okusunsulwamu wamu n’empapula endala okuva mu kakiiko k’ebyokulonda, nebatandika okutalaaga disitulikiti ez’enjawulo okunoonya abalonzi abayinza okubawa emikono. Mu mateeka buli omu alina okufuna abamusemba okuva mu disitulikiti 90 ate ng’abo abamusembye tebafaanagana na ba mulala. Okunoonyereza okwakoleddwa omukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network, kulaga nti ng’ggyeeko Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni, abalonzi gwe bayinza okutya okusamba ssente eziri wakati wa siringi lukumi n’akakaaga, abalala ababatuukiridde babakaliddemu nebabasaba ssente okubawa emikono gyabwe n’endagamuntu. Bano beemulugunyizza ne bateegeeza nga bwe kibafuukidde ekizibu okumanya oba ng’abalonzi bano ababasaba ssente tebakoze kye kimu ku bannaabwe abasoose okugenda mu bitundu bino.  Bano balaze okutya nti banditwala emikono eri akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga gye gimu n’egya bannaabwe nebalagirwa okuddayo banone emirala ate nga n’akadde kaweddeyo. Omu beegwanyiza Obwapulezidenti atalina kibiina, Hillary Humphrey Kaweesi agambye nti ye ne ttiimu ye basobodde okutuuka mu disitulikiti 56 naye yonna abalonzi bamusabye nnusu lukumi okusobola okumuwa endagamuntu n’okumuteerako omukono nga bano. Ate John Herbert Nkangabwa, nga naye yeesimbyewo ku lulwe, olwokaano yaludduseemu oluvannyuma lw’okugezaako okufuna emikono n’alemesebwa ng’agamba nti abalonzi babadde bamusaba nnusu Kakaaga buli omu, ekitegeeza nti okufuna emikono gyonna gye yeetaaga alina okusaasaanya obukadde 54 ate bw’atalina kuba negyayise yabadde yeetambuza wamu n’okwesuza. Ye Phiona Mirembe ategeezezza nti ekizibu ky’abantu okumusaba ssente kyandimulemesa okufuna emikono gye yeetaaga okuvuganya.  Mirembe gambye nti ekizibu kino okusinga kiri mu Buganda ne Ankole ng’ebitundu ebirala okuli eby’obuvanjuba ne mumambuka yo si bibi nnyo. “Nange nsanze ekizibu kye kimu ng’abantu bansaba ssente buli we ndaga naye nze ngezaako okukozesa ssente entono ze nina w’enina okuzikozesa era kino kisinziira ku kitundu gy’obeera olaze.” Mirembe bw’annyonnyodde. Ebibiina by’obwannakyewa ebirondoola eby’okulonda n’okuteekawo obwenkanya, bivumiridde ebikolwa bino nebisaba abalonzi okutegeera omugaso gw’okulonda n’abantu okwesimbawo era batunuulire ensonga n’endowooza z’abo abaagala okubasemba okusinga ensimbi. Akulira ekitongole kya Initiative for Social and Economic Rights (ISER), Salima Namusobya, ategeezezza nti abaagala okwesimbawo tebakoze kimala okukunga abalonzi okubeegattako n’okutegeera ebirowoozo byabwe okusobola okubanguyiza okufuna emikono. Agambye nti abeesimbyewo abamu baweebwa ssente okwesimbawo, okunoonya emikono n’okukuba enkug’aana naye bwebamala okuwangula akalulu  batuukiriza bigendererwa by’abo ababawa  ssente so si balonzi. “Mu bitundu ebimu tulabye kkampuni nga zitiisatiisa abali mu bifo nga baagala okudda okwesimbawo nti singa tebabawa kkontulakiti ze basaba bajja kuteeka ssente mu babavuganya era kino ebiseera ebisinga bakituukiriza.” Namusobya bw’agambye. Akulira eby’okulondoola akalulu mu kibiina kya Citizens Coalition for Electoral Democracy (CCEDU), Ivan Mwaka, ategeezezza nga bwe bagoberera ensonga z’okwewandiisa kw’abeesimbyewo naye alaze okutya nti abalonzi n’abeesimbyewo akalulu bakalabamu kimu, ssente. Kyategeerekese nti abeesimbyewo 82 be baggyeeyo empapula okwewandiisa ku bwapulezidenti nga ku bano kuliko abakyala munaana okuli; Faith Amaro, Maureen Kyalya, Pamela Amolo, Juliana Grace Kabarungi, Linda Nancy Kalembe, Janet Kataha Komugisha, Brenda Katushemererwe, Elizabeth Katwe Lugudde ne Phiona Mirembe. Etteeka ly’okulonda omukulembeze w’eggwanga (Presidential Elections Act) ekitundu nnamba 10 (b), kiragira eyeesimbyewo okusembebwa abalonzi 100 okuva mu bitundu 2 bya kusatu (2/3) ku disitulikiti zonna eziri mu Uganda.

headline: Aba DFCU baguze emijoozi gy’ emisinde gy’Amazaalibwa
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, leero agenyiwaddeko ku kitebe ekikulu ekya bbanka ya DFCU mu Kampala mu kaweefube w’okwetegekera emisinde gy’Amazaalibwa ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ssabbiiti ejja. Katikkiro Mayiga n’aba bbanka ya DFCU Ku bugenyi buno Kamalabyonna awerekeddwako Omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro, Prof. Twaha Kaawaase, Minisita w’ebyemizannyo Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe n’abalala. “Tuzze wano kubanga DFCU munnamukago munnaffe mu lutalo lwe tuliko okuzza Buganda ku ntikko ne Uganda okukulaakulana.” Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Ono agambye nti mu nsonga za Buganda Ssemasonga ettaano, ennyingo eyookuna ekwata ku byabulamu era nga wano Beene we yasinziira n’alagira bisoosowazibwe. Mayiga agambye nti Nnamunswa yasiimye omwaka guno n’emyaka ebiri eginaddako essira liteekebwe ku kawuka akaleeta Mukenenya. Kamalabyonna asinzidde wano n’ategeeza nti okwolesebwa kwa Buganda kwe kulaba ng’omuntu asembayo wansi abeera wadde waddeko mu mbeera ze ez’ebyobulamu. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti ekitongole kya bbanka kyonna nga DFCU kirina okufaayo okulaba nga bakasitoma baakyo babeera balamu nga balwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya era bategeere amakubo Siriimu mw’akwatira wamu n’engeri gy’asobola okujjanjabwa. Kamalabyonna Mayiga yeeyamye okulaba nga omukago gwa DFCU ne Buganda guvaamu ebibala era gugase enjuyi zombi. Ssenkulu wa DFCU omukungu, Mathias Katamba, agambye nti ekirwadde kya Mukenenya kikosezza amaka ag’enjawulo era nga kisinze kukosa bavubuka abawala n’abalenzi nga waliwo obwetaavu okukirwanyisa. Omukungu Katamba annyonnyodde nti ekimu ku bigendererwa kwe kusikiriza abasajja okwekebeza era abo abasangiddwa n’ekirwadde batandike eddagala olw’obulamu obulungi. Ono ategeezezza nti bbanka eno eyagala okulaba ng’abantu mu ggwanga babeera balamu kiyambe ebyenkulaakulana okukula. Omukungu Katamba asabye abantu okwenyigira mu misinde gino wakati mu kwekuuma ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Aba bbanka ya DFCU baguze emijoozi egiwerako era ne beeyama okwongera okuwagira olutalo lw’Obwakabaka ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya.

headline: Cheptegei awangulidde Uganda omudaali gwa zzaabu e Monaco
text: Munnayuganda Joshua Cheptegei amenye likoda bwawangudde omudaali gwa zzaabu mu misinde gy’akafubutuko egibadde e Monaco mu Bufaransa. Ono emisinde egya kilomita ettaano agiddukidde eddakiika 12:51 nga amanyeewo likoda ebadde yateekebwawo munnakenya Rhonex Kipruto eyali yaziddukira eddakiika 13:18 omwezi oguwedde mu Valencia mu Spain.  Omwaka oguwedde Cheptegie on era yawangulira Uganda omudaali gwa zaabu oluvanyuma lw’okuwangula emisinde egya mita 10,000.  Muk’omukelembeze w’eggwanga era minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo Janet Museveni ayozaayozezza nnyo Cheptegei olw’okutuuta ku buwanguzi buno.

headline: Minisita Kiyimba asabye abavubuka okunyweza empisa bakulaakulane
text: Minisita w’Amawulire era Omwogezi w’Obwakabakaera Omuyima w’ekibiina kya Baganda Nkerettanyi, Owek. Noah Kiyimba akubirizza abavubukanaddala abaweereza mu Bwakabakaokunyweza empisa bweba baagala okukulaakulana era bakimanye nti abantu ekifaananyi kye babalabiramu kyekyo ekya Buganda. Minisita okwogera bino abadde asisinkannye olukiiko olufuzi olwe ekibiina ki Baganda Nkeretannyi wano ku mnuga enkulu e Bulange eMmengoku Lwokusatu. “Okusookera ddala aba Nkerettanyi nga bannakyewa mu Bwakabaka ensonga y’empisa eteekeddwa okubeera ku mwanjo. Bateekeddwa okubeera ab’empisa era beekulaakulanye ng’abantu kuba tugenda kubatunuulira nga ssekinnoomu okulaba buli omu enteekateeka z’alina okumutwala mu maaso eky’omukisa omulungi balina ekibiina mwe beegattira.” Minisita Noah Kiyimba bw’ategeezezza. Minisita kiyimba abafalaasidde okwenyigira n’okwettanira enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka naddala Emmwanyi Terimba kibayambe okusobola okukuuma ettaka lyabwe ate basobole okulikulaakulanya. Owek. Kiyimba yeebazizza bannakibiina kino olw’omulimu amakula gwe bakola buli Beene lwasiima okulambula ku bantu be nga bawunda ekiwu awamu n’ogwo gwe baliko mu masiro e Kasubi okuwawula emmuli awamu n’okunaaza essuubi nga balisunsula. Abasabye okubeera eky’okulabirako mu bitundu gyebava okusobola okukuuma ekitiibwa kya Buganda n’okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Owek. Kiyimba abakunze okuweerera abaana nga Beene bwe yalagira era abo abatalina busobozi beeyambise omukisa gwa bbasale z’Obwakabaka ezisoba mu mutwalo omulamba buli mwaka kuba Buganda yeetaaga abantu abasomye okutambula obulungi. YeSsentebe w’ekibiina kino Ssaalongo Mukalazi Abdu Rahuman ategeezeza nti ng’ekibiina baakusigala nga baweereza Beene awatali kumutiiririra kw’ossa n’okulwana okwekulaakulanya okusobola okunyweza ekitiibwa kya Buganda. Mu nsisinkano eno era kitegeerekese ng’olukiiko oluggya bwe lugenda okulayizibwa nga 18, March, 2022 olwo abakulembeze abapya basobole okutambuza emirimu mu butongole. Ng’oggyeeko egy’Embuga abavubuka mu kibiina kino bafumba ku mikolo awamu n’okutimba okusobola okweyimirizaawo awamu n’okwekulaakulanya.

headline: AKALULU 2021: Mugisha Muntu agaanye Okwekebeza Covid
text: Bya Ronald Sserwadda Kampala Akulira ekibiina kya Alliance For National Transformation era nga y’akikwatidde bbendera, Rt.Gen Mugisha Muntu, agaanye okwekebeza Ssennyiga Corona ng’agamba nti tekiri mu mateeka. Gen. Mugisha Muntu nga ayogerako ne bannamawulire Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kaasaba buli ayagala okuvuganya ku bukulembeze bw’eggwanga n’abantu 9 abagenda okubasemba okusooka okwekebeza Covid-19, okwewala okusiiga abalala singa wabeerawo alina obulwadde buno. Ku beesimbyewo n’abantu baabwe, akakiiko kaakazuulamu abantu 3 abalina Covid-19. Mugisha Muntu ategeezezza nti mu mateeka g’alina okutuukiriza okwesimbawo, ekyokukebeza Covid-19 tekiriimu. “Tuli bantu abagoberera amateeka era gonna agalambikiddwa obulungi omuli n’ago ge tutakkaanya nago tugagoberedde, naye okwekebeza twagaanye kubanga balina ebigendererwa ebikusike. Kati baagala okutugamba nti abantu bonna be basisinkana babeera bamaze okubakebera? Ne be basanga ku nguudo, ne be basisinkana ekiro? Twabadde mu kuwandiisa babaka ba palamenti n’abalala, bo nga tebaabakebedde? Kya njawulo ki ku ffe?Tulina obukookolo bwaffe (Mask), ne sanitayiza bye tugenda okukozesa naye okwekebeza nedda.” bw’ategeezezza. Omubaka omukyala owa Kasese, Winnie Kiiza era omu ku bagenda okusemba muntu ku by’okwesimbawo agamba nti naye teyeekebezza nti yabadde tasobola kwekebeza kubanga enkola eno eyagala kuleetawo busosoze mu bulwadde bwa Covid. “Akakiiko kalina buyinza ki obutulagira okwekebeza? Bwe tubasaba ebbaluwa z’abantu bonna abeesimbyewo ddala basobola okuzituwa? Ebyo tetusobola kubikkiriza kubanga tetulina tteeka lye tumenye.” Winnie Kiiza. Mugisha Muntu agenda kwewandiisa ku ssaawa mwenda ogwemisana. Ajjidde ku mulamwa gwa kukyusa mbeera z’abantu mu ggwanga naddala okuteekawo obukulembeze obuteeka essira ku biruma abantu.

headline: Besigye alekedde FDC ekigezo – Mao
text: Ssenkaggale wa Democratic Party (DP) agambye nti okusalawo kwa Dr. Kizza Besigye obuteesimbawo mu kalulu ka 2021 kwekugezesebwa okukyasinze eri ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change (FDC).  Besigye abadde yakeesimbawo enfunda nnya (4) ekiragiriro kino yakikoledde ku kitebe kya FDC ku Lwokusatu. Okugumizza kyeyasazzeewo Besigye yagambye nti, bakkiriziganyiza n’ekibiina kye baleete omuntu omulala okwesimbawo kyeyayise pulaani A nategeeza nti ye wakusigala ku pulaani B. Mao agamba nti Besigye abadde mmundu mmenye mukuvuganya pulezidenti Museveni n’obukulembeze bwe nga akalulu ka 2021 kigenda kubeera kigezo kinene eri FDC. Ono yanyonyodde nga Besigye bwalese ekituli ekinene mu FDC ekitasobola kuzibibwa. Wabula akulira ekibiina ki Social Democratic Party Michael Mabikke, nga ono yakasala eddiiro neyegatta ku National Unity Platform (NUP) agamba akadde kabadde katuuse Dr. Kizza Besigye okulekera omuntu omulala alina ebirowoozo ebito avuganye. Mabikke yagasseeko nti wadde Besigye ye munnabyabufuzi yekka ku ludda oluvuganya asobodde okuweza ebitundu 30 ku 100 kwabo ababadde bavuganya Museveni naye tekitegeeza nti lye ssuubi lya Opozisoni lyokka. Ono yajjuliza Dr. Paul Kawanga Semwogerere eyafuna ebitundu 27 ku 100 mu kalulu ka 1996 okulaga nti Besigye ssi wanjawulo. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri abawagizi b’ekibiina Besigye yagambye nti pulezidenti Museveni tasobola kuwaayo buyinza nga ayita mu kalulu. Ku nsonga eno Mao, agamba nti wadde kizibu okuwangulira Museveni mu kalulu naye kisoboka singa abantu bakolera wamu era nga beteeseteese bulungi. Wano Mabikke yalaze nti kisobokera ddala Opozisoni okuwangula akalulu naawa ebyokulabirako mu Africa obuyinza gyebukyuse nga e Gambia. Ate ye omutunuulizi w’ebyobufuzi Yusuf Serunkuma, yategeezezza nti embeera eri mu nsi obuyinza gyebukyuse ya njawulo. Serunkuma agattako nti pulezidenti mu Uganda asobola okukyanga akalulu nekatuuka nga akakiiko k’ebyokulonda tekakyagasa. Yalambuludde nti oba Besigye waali oba Robert Kyagulanyi, Museveni asobola okukyanga akalulu nafunamu kyayagala.

headline: Mufti Mubajje atabukidde abasiraamu abakola effujjo mu kkampeyini
text: Kampala Mufti wa Uganda, Shiekh Ramadhan Mubajje, avumiridde enneeyisa ya bannayuganda mu kkampeyini n’ategeeza nti eno etteeka obusiraamu mu matigga kubanga buyigiriza bulijjo okubeera n’empisa ennungi.  Bino Mubajje abyogeredde mu kulambula disitulikiti ezikola ekitundu kya Wakiso eky’obusiraamu bw’abadde ayogerako eri abasiraamu ku ssomero lya One Umma School- Kaliiti mu ggombolola y’e Mmende. Mubajje ategeezezza nti abavubuka bangi bavudde ku njigiriza y’obuyisiraamu wakati ng’eggwanga lisemberera okulonda kwa 2021. “Empisa ky’ekintu ekiwedde mu basiraamu, obusiraamu busigaddewo nga bulagira empisa ennungi naye ate abasiraamu, ba Imam ne bamashiekh empisa si zeezo ennungi. Kati tugenda mu kiseera kya kulonda naye ate ojja kusanga omuvubuka omusiraamu n’atali ng’omusiraamu y’asinga okwolesa empisa enkyamu.” Mubajje bw’agambye. Ono asabye abakulembeze b’eddiini mu kitundu kino okufaayo n’okubuulirira abavubuka, kiyambe okutaasa ku mpisa ezongera okugootaana buli lukya. Mubajje yasiimye ekibiina ky’abazungu ekya One Umma olw’okufaayo okukyusa obulamu bw’abasiraamu mu Uganda n’ategeeza nti kino kyongera okulaga nti eddiini y’Obusiraamu si ya bawarabu bokka ng’abasinga bwe balowooza. Disitulikiti Kadhi wa Wakiso, Sheikh Elias Kigozi, yennyamidde olw’abantu abaagala okunyaga ettaka ly’obusiraamu n’okulikozesa ku mpaka nga tebafunye lukkusa okuva mu bakulu abalivunaanyizibwako. Ekitundu kino eky’obusiraamu ekya Wakiso, kikolebwa; Nansana, Nabweru, Kitaasa-Gombe, Kakiri, Masuuliita, Nsangi, Kira ne Kasangati era nga kiri wansi w’obukulembeze bwa Kampala mukadde.

headline: Anita Among:  Bannamawulire naba NUP baagala omusango ogwabawaabira Sipiika  gubagyibweko, tewali bujulizi
text: Abantu 4 abavunaanibwa omusango gw’okuvvoola Sipiika wa Palamenti, Anita Among basabye Ssaabawaabi wa gavmenti okubaggyako emisango gino kuba tewali bujulizi bubalumiriza. Bano kuliko omusuubuzi Francis Matovu amanyiddwa nga Butto, omukunzi w’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform Moses Bigirwa ne bannamawulire Pidson Kareire awamu ne Moses Mugalula. Kigambibwa nti mu Novemba w’omwaka 2021 nga basinziira e Kampala, abana bano bakozesa omukutu gwa WhatsApp nebateekako obubaka obwali bulaga nga Pulezidenti Museveni bw’agenda okugoba Among ku kifo ky’omumyuka wa Sipiika kyeyaliko olw’okulya enguzi okuva ku kampuni ya Roko Construction ne Kingdom Property awamu n’abalala. Oludda oluwaabi lugamba nti bano okufulumya obubaka buno tebagenderera kuwa mawulire okuggyako okwonoona erinnya lya Sipiika n’okulinyirira emirembe gye. Bano emisango bagyegaana era bwebatyo nebayimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti. Wabula mu kiwandiiko abakwate kyebawandiikidde Ssaabawaabi Frances Abodo ekyalabiddwako aba URN ekiriko ennaku z’omwezi nga September 14, 2022 bano bategeezezza nti kikwasa ennaku okulaba nti baakwatibwa nebasimbibwa mu kkooti nga tewali bujulizi. Bano bannyonnyodde nti emirundi ettaano gyebaleeteddwa mu kkooti, oludda oluwaabi lubadde lwekwasa obusonga songa kuba poliisi yabatwalako essimu zabwe ne kompyuta okunoonyereza ku musango guno naye tewali kyebaali bafunye. Abavunaanwa bategeezezza nti wadde obujulizi obwaliwo bwali bunafu naye oludda oluwaabi lwagenda mu maaso n’okubavunaana nga baagala omusango guno gubaggyibweko era fayiro Ssaabawaabi agiyite kuba kino kiboonoonera ssente n’obudde bwebamala mu kkooti. Ye omuwaabi wa gavumenti ali mu musango guno, Caroline Marion Acio agamba nti omusango guno yagwetegereza bulungi nga basobola bulungi okugutuusa ku nkomerero yagwo. Kati ono ayagala akuliddemu okunoonyereza ku musango guno (CID) okumaliriza okunoonyereza mu bwangu basobole okuguwa ennaku z’omwezi kwegulina okutandika okuwulirwa. Kinajjukirwa nti omu ku bano Matovu, yawawaabira Anita Among ne gavumenti nga abavunaana okumutulugunya ne bamuteekako ebisago byeyali akwatiddwa. Omusango guno Matovu yalemwa okuguwangula mu kkooti enkulu bwatyo najulira mu kkooti ejulirwamu era guno gukyalinze okuwulirwa.

headline: Kkooti egobye obujulizi bwa Kyagulanyi obuwera 130
text: Kampala Omusango gwa munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu mw’awakanyiza okulangirirwa kwa Pulezidenti Museveni, kuzzeemu omukoosi oluvannyuma lwa kkooti ensukkulumu okugaana obujulizi obuwera 130 obwatwaliddwayo bannamateeka be. Bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi nga beegeyaamu Kkooti ensukkulumu bwe yabadde ekola enteekateeka okuwulira omusango guno, bannamateeka ku ludda lwa Kyagulanyi baasabye bongerwe obudde basobole okuwaayo obujulizi wabula kkooti n’ebalagira okuwaayo obujulizi buno nga February 14. Wabula bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi ku Ssande akawungeezi baliko obujulizi bwe baatutte mu kkooti wabula n’egaana okubukkiriza kuba akaseera kadde kayise. Mu bbaluwa eyavuddemu bannamateeka ba Wameli & Co. Advocates baawandikidde kkooti ensukkulumu nga basaba ekkirize obujulizi obulala obwabadde buleeteddwa oluvannyuma lw’essaawa 11 ku Ssande. “ Ku lunaku lwa 14 February, twabadde ku kkooti ku ssaawa 11 n’obumu ku bujulizi wadde obulala bwatuuse kikeerezi nga kkooti zigaddewo, ku Mmande nga 15 obujulizi bwonna tusobodde okubuleeta, tusaba kkooti ebukkiriza tusobole okubuwa n’abawawaabirwa,” Ebbaluwa bwe yategeezezza. Wabula Omuwandiisi wa kkooti ensukkulumu, Ssali Harriet Lukwago, yagaanye okubukkiriza ngagamba nti obudde bwabadde buyiseeko kuba kkooti yali yabawa lwa 14 olwa Ssande. Lukwago yagambye nti obujulizi 50 bwokka obwaweereddwayo mu budde bukola omuwendo gw’ ensalira okukkirizibwa kkooti okusobola okugenda mu maaso n’omusango guno. Kuno kwe kusoomoozebwa okwokubiri Kyagulanyi ne banne kwe baafunye ng’okwasooka kwe kwa kkooti okugaana ennongoosereza ze baali baagala okukola mu mpaaba yaabwe.

headline: Bannayuganda 63,000 be bagenda okugemebwa Ssennyiga Corona
text: Kampala Oluvannyuma lw’emyezi kkumi ng’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kibaluseewo mu ggwanga, aba minisitule y’ebyobulamu balangiridde nti bategeka okugema abantu 63,000 ku mutendera ogusooka. Omuteesiteesi Atwine nga anyonyola Bino byayogeddwa muteesiteesi omukulu owa Minisitule y’ebyobyulamu, Dr. Diana Atwine bwe yabadde asisinkanye akakiiko ka palamenti ak’ebyobulamu eggulo ku Mmande. “Tugenda kusooka okugemako ebitundu 20 ku buli 100.
