Okusooka tujja kusooka kugema basawo, olwo gavumenti enoonye ssente endala tufune erinaagema abantu abalala.” Atwine bwe yagambye. Okusinziira ku Atwine, essira liteereddwa ku bakadde, abasawo wamu n’abo abalina ebirwadde ebikambwe nga Ssukkaali, Puleesa, abalwadde b’ensigo wamu n’omutima. “Ku bantu 318 abaakafa, abantu 2 bokka be bali wansi w’emyaka 19.” Atwine bwe yannyonnyodde. Ono yagambye nti nga gavumenti balina okuteekawo enteekateeka ku ddagala lino erya AstraZeneca lye baleeta nga singa akabi konna kagwawo okugeza nga bagemye omuntu n’agwa n’afa, obuzibu tebuddira kkampuni yakola ddagala lino. Atwine yategeezezza nti bannayuganda tebalina kugendera ku ng’ambo za mutimbagano eziraga nga Uganda bw’egenda okugula eddagala lino ku bbeeyi eya waggulu okusinga ku mawanga amalala, ky’agamba nti si kituufu. Dr. Atwine agamba nti ekitongole kya ‘Global alliance for Vaccines and Immunisation (GAVI) kye balinze okubawa olukkusa okutuusa eddagala lino. Ono yannyonnyodde nti wansi w’enkola ya COVAX, eruubirira okulaba ng’abantu bonna bafuna eddagala lya Ssennyiga Corona nga tebafuddeyo oba likyakula oba nedda ku bbeeyi eya wansi era nga enkola eno eri wansi wa GAVI. Wakati mu butali bumativu, abamu ku babaka okuli Gaffa Mbwatekamwa baatadde Dr. Atwine ku nninga, annyonnyole engeri gy’asuubira okutuusa eddagala ku bannayuganda nga masiki n’okutuusa kati bamu tebazifunanga. Mu kwanula, Dr. Atwine yagambye nti baali batunuulidde okugaba masiki obukadde 34 naye olwaleero baakagabako obukadde 31 mu disitulikiti 125 ng’ebulayo obukadde nga bubiri era nga balinze ssente okugaba endala

headline: Aba Ultimate Fitness Kampala (UFK) basse omukago ne SC Villa
text: Kkampuni ya Ultimate Fitness Kampala (UFK) ekoze omukago ne ttiimu ya SC Villa okugiyambako okukuumira abazannyi baayo ku mutindo.  Kino kyalangiriddwa eggulo ku Lwokubiri mu kiwandiiko ekyafulumiziddwa akulira ebyamawulire ku kkiraabu eno, Bernard Olupot. ” Aba Ultimate Fitness Kampala basanyukidde eky’okutta omukago ne ttiimu esinga obuganzi mu Uganda  Premier league” obumu ku bubaka obuli mu kiwandiiko bwe bwasomye. Endagaano eno etegeeza nti, kati aba Ultimate Fitness Kampala (UFK) be bayambako aba SC Villa mu bintu by’okukola dduyiro wamu n’okukuuma emibiri gy’abasambi nga giri ku mutindo era ng’ebaliriddwamu obukadde bwa siringi za Uganda 430,726,000/=. Omutendesi wa Villa, Edward Kaziba, yasanyukidde endagaano eno n’ategeeza nti bulijjo kino kye beetaaga. Sizoni ewedde SC Villa yamalira mu kifo kyakusatu n’obubonero 46 okuva mu nzannya 25 oluvannyuma lwa liigi y’eggwanga okusazibwamu olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Wakati nga liigi egenda kuddamu mu mwezi ogujja ogwa Novemba, aba SC Villa baatandise dda okwetegeka basobole okuvuganya obulungi mu sizoni ya 2020/2021

headline: Abalala 262 be baakwatiddwa ku kwekalakaasa kwa Bobi Wine – Poliisi
text: Kampala Ab’ebyokwerinda mu ggwanga bategeezezza nga bwe bakutte abantu abalala 262 ku by’okwenyigira mu kwekalakaasa okwaliwo oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa kwa kw’alina bbendera ya NUP, Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) Ssabbiiti ewedde. omuvubuka Emmanuel Ssimbwa Ssebuliba eyakwatiddwa ku by’okukuba omupoliisi akayondo Abawagizi ba Bobi Wine baavaayo ne beekalakaasa mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebitali bimu era nga poliisi yawalirizibwa okukozesa ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi okusobola okubagumbulula era okukakkana ng’abantu abawerako bafudde. Okusooka ab’ebyokwerinda baategeeza nti baali bakutte abantu 577 mu nnaku ebiri okwekalakaasa kuno ze kwamala. Omwogezi wa Poliisi, Fred Enanga, ategeezezza bannamawulire leero ku ssengejjero lya gavumenti ery’amawulire nti oluvannyuma lw’okwekenneenya obutambi, baliko abantu abalala 262 be baagombyemu obwala. Okusinziira ku Enanga omugatte gw’abakwate guli 836 era nga ku bano 362 baamaze dda okusimbibwa mu kkooti ne bavunaanibwa omugaso gw’okukuma mu balala omuliro, okwonoona ebintu wamu n’okwekalakaasa mu ngeri emenya amateeka. Abalala 633, Enanga annyonnyodde nti nabo Ssabbiiti eno bagenda kutwalibwa mu kkooti basobole okubitebya. Poliisi eraga nti fayiro ze yaakamaliriza ziwera 116 naye nga baliko abalala abali bakuliddemu okwekalakaasa kuno be bakyanoonya era nga baakwongera okukozesa kkamera zaabwe okuzuula wonna we bali. Ab’ebyokwerinda bagamba nti omuwendo gw’abantu abafudde gwalinnye okuva ku bantu 28 ne gutuuka ku bantu 45. Enanga abuulidde bannamawulire nti n’omuvubuka Emmanuel Ssimbwa Ssebuliba eyalabikira ku katambi ng’akuba akulira poliisi y’e Nakivubo, Consulate Kasule, naye bamulina eyali agezaako okuggya emisanvu mu kkubo okuliraana ekizimbe kya Totalia Buliding naye bamulina. Poliisi ennyonnyola nti basajja baayo 11 baakubibwa amayinja ne bafuna ebisago mu kwekalakaasa kuno ate ng’abantu ba bulijjo abasoba mu 100 baafuna ebisago. Ayongeddeko nti baliko obutambi obwasaasaanyizibwa ku mutimbagano bwe bali mu kwetegereza ku bamu ku bantu abaali bakola effujjo n’asuubiza nti ne bano bagenda kukwatibwa.

headline: Abakulembeze abalonde e Kyotera n’e Rakai balayidde
text: Akulira abalamuzi ba kkooti esookerwako e Masaka, Charles Yeteise, alayizza abakulembeze mu Disitulikiti  okuli Kyotera ne Rakai basobole okuddukanya emirimu egyabatumwa. Omumyuka wa Ppookino w’essaza Buddu asooka, owek. Rose Nalubowa, yasinzidde wano n’asaba abakulembeze abapya okwewala entalo, wabula bakolere abantu. Bo bakansala abaalondeddwa beeyamye okukolera abantu baabwe awatali kusosola mu bibiina byabufuzi. Ssentebe wa disitulikiti  y’e Kyotera, Patrick Kintu Kisekulo, yagambye nti asookera ku kuzza bumu ssaako n’okuweereza abantu baabwe. Ababaka b’ekitundu kino okuli, John Paul Lukwago Mpalanyi ne Fortunate Rose Nantongo baategeezezza nti balina essuubi okulaba ng’obukulembeze obuggya buweereza abantu. Oluvannyuma Omulamuzi Charles Yeiteise yalondesezza sipiika, nga Agnes Namusiitwa yamegganye ne Lubinga Francis Xavier. Gye byaggweeredde nga Lubinga aliko obulemu awangudde obwasipiika ku bululu 17 ku 15. E Rakai ekire ky’enkuba kyataataganyizza enteekateeka z’okulayira  wabula omukwanaganya w’emirimu gya Ssaabasajja Kabaka e Kkooki, Gertrude Ssebuggwawo yagumizza abalonde nga bw’agenda okukola ekisoboka okulaba nga batambuza emirimu gya Ssaabasajja e Kkooki. Ono era yasabye abavubuka okubeera abavumu mu bye bakola n’agamba nti ye alwanye okukulembera Rakai emyaka 30 okutuusa Omukama w’amwanukudde . Abadde Ssentebe wa Rakai, Robert Benon Mugabi, agambye nti Rakai balina we bagituusizza mu by’enjigiriza n’abasaba abakulembeze okwongeramu amaanyi.  Oluvannyuma Omulamuzi Yeiteise alayizizza sipiika wa Disitulikiti  ye Rakai nga Charles Kadumya Sseggiriinya aliko obulemu yawangudde ku bululu 21 n’amegga banne. John Magalo yafunye obululu 9 ate Derrick Tusubira n’afuna 10.

headline: Wakiso Giants Efunye Omuzibizi Omujja
text: Tiimu y’omupiira eya Wakiso Giants erangiridde nga bwemaze okukansa omuzannyi Edward Satulo. Ono agenda kukola ng’omuzibizi muyite center back. Satulo yasizza omukono ku ndagaano ya myaka esatu nga y’akuggwako mu 2023. Kyokka era mu ndagaaano eno, mulimu akawaayiro ak’okumwongeramu omwaka omulala mulamba. Omuzibizi ono ow’emyaka 20 avudde mu Wobulenzi FC era nga azanyiddeko mu mpaka z’amasaza ery’e Singo ne Gomba. Bweyazannyira mu mpaka zino yaziwangula emirundi ebiri era nga mumwaka gwa 2017 yali mu tiimu ya Gomba FC ate 2018 yali mu Ssingo FC ezaawangula ebikopo. Satulo ategezezza nti musanyufu nnyo olw’eddaala lyeyeeyongeddeko olw’okwegatta ku tiimu naategeeza nti mwetegefu okuvuganya mu liigi ya Uganda esooka. Ono yategeezezza nti amanyi okuvuganya okukambwe bwekubeera ng’akolera wamu n’omutendesi, bazannyi banne wamu n’abawagizi. “Nja kuyamba ku tiimu yange okutuuka ku buwanguzi,” Satulo bweyagmbye. Daglous Bamweyana coach wa Wakiso Giants ategezezza nga Satulo bwali omuzibizi omuto amanyi eky’okukola era nga asobola okubeera omuzanyi owakabi mubwangu obw’ekitalo.

headline: Owek. Mayiga akunze bannayuganda okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Kkookolo (Kkansa)
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu okwegatta ku banna Rotary nga badduka mu misinde gimwetooloola byalo egituumiddwa ‘Rotary Cancer Run’ okusobola okufufugaza ekirwadde kya kkookolo ekifuuse ensonga mu ggwanga. Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoledde mu  ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atongoza emisinde gya Rotary egya Cancer Run egy’omwaka 2021. “Bw’oba oyagala Katonda olina kusooka kwagala bantu. Ate nze ndowooza engeri esinga okubeera entuufu, omu okulaga omulala nti amufaako kwe kumuyamba mu nsonga z’ebyobulamu. Buli omu alina bye yeegomba naye tolina ky’osobola kutuukako nga toli mulamu.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nti amaka mangi mu ggwanga gatawaanyiziddwa ekirwadde kya kkookolo. Bw’atyo ne yeebaza banna Rotary olw’okuvaayo ne basalawo okuzimba waadi y’ekirwadde kya Kkookolo. Mukuumaddamula yeebazizza Centenary Bank olw’okuvaayo ne bayambeko. Bw’atyo n’asaba abantu okuvaayo badduke basobole okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa ky’emisinde gino eky’okukuuma abantu nga balamu nga mu ngeri eno ne Buganda ejja kusobola okudda ku ntikko. Bwe tutabeera na bantu balamu, ebirooto byaffe tebijja kutuukirira. Muveeyo twegatte ku Rotary tusobole okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Kkookolo nga twetaba mu misinde gya Rotary Cancer Run nga 29 , September 2020.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’akunze. Minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’abavubuka mu Buganda, Owek Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu ategeezezza nti omulamwa gwa Cancer Run mukulu nnyo kuba kugwatta ku byabulamu nga tebusosola mu ggwanga wadde eddiini era n’abasiima olw’ebyo ebituukiddwako okutaasa obulamu bw’abantu. Owek. Ssekabembe akunze bannabyamizannyo okwettanira emisinde gino basobole okuyambako okutaasa obulamu. Ssenkulu wa Centenary Bank, Omuk. Fabian Kasi ategeezezza nti emyaka 30 egiyise nga bakola emirimu nga bbanka, baasalawo okuteeka Buganda ne Uganda ku mwanjo era nga kino kirabira mu ppulogulaamu ez’Obwakabaka omuli Kyapa mu ngalo, Buganda Bumu awamu n’ebirala. Omuk. Kasi annyonnyodde nti baakukola kyonna okukunga abantu mu Uganda n’ebweru waayo basobole okukwataganira awamu okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino nga bakolera wamu ne Banna Rotary era nga bawaddeyo ensimbi obukadde 50 okuyamba ku nteekateeka eno.

headline: Minisita ne Ba Memba ba Palamenti baziyiziddwa okulambula Eddwaliro lye Lubowa
text: Minister Dokita Ruth Acheng, Abakungu okuva mu Minisitule y’ebyobulamu mu gavumenti ya wakati ne ba memba ba Palamenti baziyiziddwa okuyingira owazimbibwa eddwaliro ly’ekikugu e Lubowa. Bano babadde bagenze okwekenenya engeri emirimu egikolebwa wano  gyegitambulamu.    Kinajukirwa nti omwaka oguwedde palamenti y’eggwanga yayisa sente obukadde obuwerera ddala bisatu n’omusobyo eza Doola ezawebwa invesita okutandika omulimu guno. kyokka kati abantu bebamu abayisa sente zino ate bebatakirizibwa kulambula mulimu bwegutambula.   Eddwaliro lino lisangibwa Lubowa ku luguudo lw’Entebbe era nga ligambibwa okuba nga lya kukola ku ndwadde eze kikugu, okusomesa abasawo abajanjaba endwadde zino ezisinga okutwala bannansi emitala wa mayanja okujanjabibwa, okujanjaba abalwadde ba Cancer, okulongoosa endwadde ez’enjawulo awamu nokukola okunonyereza mu kisaawe ky’ebyobulamu.

headline: Kabaka asiimye okwetaba ku nnyimba z’amazaalibwa
text: Ssabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II olwaleero asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda okwetaba ku mikolo gy’ennyimba z’amazaalibwa ga Yesu Kulisito egigenda okubeera mu bimuli bya Bulange. Beene asuubirwa okutuuka ku Bulange ku ssaawa 11 ez’akawungeezi era nga wakwanirizibwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga. Katikkiro ye asuubirwa okutuuka kussaawa kkumi n’ekitundu. Abagoberezi ba Kulisito Abalokole bebasuubirwa okukuliramu ennyimba zino. Omukolo gugenda kutandika kussaawa Munaana, n’okutuuka kw’abaweereza bonna okuva mu bitongole by’Obwakabaka byonna. Kkwaya ez’enjawulo omuli, Calvary Cross Choir, African Children’s’ choir, Jehovah Shalom Choir, Light of the World Choir, Kansanga Miracle Mass Choir, Choir Y’abaweereza, Mwangaza Children’s Choir wamu ne Watoto Choir zezigenda okuyimba. N’omuyimbi Pastor Wilson Bugembe naye asuubirwa okuyimba. Abasumba babalokole ab’enjawulo basuubirwa okusabira Obuganda wamu ne Uganda eyamu. Mubano mulimu, Pastor John Mulinde, Omusumba Joshua Lwere, Ssonko Lameka, Ivan Kimera, Norah Namazzi, Pastor Joseph Sserwadda wamu n’omusumba Robert Kayanja. Ku mukolo guno era Katikkiro kw’agenda okugabira ebirabo eri abakozi b’Obwakabaka wamu ne kkwaya. Katikkiro era asuubirwa okukozesa omukolo guno okuwa obubakabwe obwa Ssekukkulu n’omwaka. Ssabasajja Kabaka asuubirwa okusala keeki okugabula Obuganda wamu n’okukoleeza omuti gwa Ssekukkulu okwagaliza abaweerezabe amazaalibwa ag’essanyu n’emirembe. Omukolo gusuubirwa okuggwa ku ssaawa 12:45.

headline: Emmwaanyi tuzirime okwesalirawo ku kulya muwogo oba omugaati – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu okusigala nga balima emmwaanyi wakati mu kusomoozebwa okuliwo nga gavumenti eyagala okuzikwasa Musigansimbi owa kampuni ya Vinci Coffee Uganda Ltd. yaba azivunaanyizibwako mu ggwanga kuba ly’ekkubo lyokka erigenda okubaggya mu bwavu. Okulambika kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoze ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atikkula oluwalo okuva mu bantu ba Kabaka ab’eggombolola ya Mutuba II Butemba ne Mutuba IX Mulagi okuva e Ssingo mu Bulange e Mmengo.   “Wadde ebitusomooza bingi, naye tulina okusigala nga tukola. Emmwaanyi tuzirime awo lwetujja okusobola okwesalirawo oba tulya muwogo oba tulya migaati,” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Mayiga anyonyodde nti wadde endagaano eno erimu ebirumira bingi naye abantu ba Kabaka tebalina kutya kulima mmwaanyi kubanga ly’ekkubo Obwakabaka bweritunuulidde okusobola okusitula embeera z’abantu wonna mu Buganda. Ono alaze obwenyamivu olw’engeri gavumenti gy’erekereddemu bannayuganda nga mukifo ky’okubakwasizaako ate ekoze kyakubalamu maanyi n’ebagobaganya mu mirimu egy’enjawulo nga ekikyasembyeyo kye ky’okuwa omugwira emmwaanyi.  Mukuumaddamula asinzidde wano nasaba bannaddiini bonna okwetaba mu nteeekateeka zonna ez’Obwakabaka era bazaagazise abantu olwo Buganda esobole okudda ku ntikko era neyeebaza abaleese Oluwalo olw’okwefiiriza nebawaayo ku kitono kyebalina. Minisita Omubeezi owa Gavumenti Ez’ebitundu Joseph Kawuki akuutidde abantu ba Kabaka bulijjo okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe nga bakiika embuga. Ye Omwami wa kabaka omulamulirako ezsaza Singo Mukwenda David Nantajja agambye kibakakatako nga abakulembeze okugatta abantu ba Kabaka era nawera okutwala enteekateeka eno mu maaso. Obukadde bw’ensimbi bubiri n’ekitundu bwebuleteddwa abantu ba Kabaka okuva mu ggombolola bbiri ezikola essaza Ssingo okubadde Butemba ne Mulagi.

headline: Minisita Mao ne Ssaabawolereza Kiryowa batabaganyizza Ssaabalamuzi Dollo ne Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja
text: Minisita w’essiga eddamuzi n’amateeka Norbert Mao wamu ne Ssaabawolereza Kiryowa Kiwanuka batuuzizza Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo ne Ssaabaminisita Robinah Nabbanja mu kafubo akatakkiriziddwamu bannamawulire okugonjoola ku butakkaanya bwebaali bafunye ku ntamubuza y’emirimu. Kino kiddiridde Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja okulumba omulamuzi wa kkooti esookerwako e Mengo namukunya ku ngeri gyeyali asindise omukazi Gertrude Nalule mu nkomyo olw’ ebbanja lya bukadde 2.8 lyeyafuna nga asinze ekibanja kye namulesaawo abaana be, Nabbanja kyeyagamba nti tekyali kya buntu. Bano basisinkanye ku Lwakusatu ku kkooti enkulu nga ensisinkano eno ebadde ekubirizibwa Ssaabawolereza Kiryowa Kiwanuka era nga minisita Norbert Mao naye agibaddemu. Oluvannyuma lwa bino, Ssaabalamuzi yavaayo nawa Nabbanja omutima ogulumirirwa agumalire mu bintu ebirala nga amalwaliro omutali ddagala naye yesonyiwe okuyingirira kkooti kuba enkola yaazo ey’emirimu erungamizibwa Ssemateeka so si ndowooza za bantu. Oluvannyuma lw’ensisinkano eno, Ssaabaminisita ne Ssaabalamuzi bategeezezza bannamawulire nga bwebakkiriziganyiza okukolera awamu okusobola okugasa bannayuganda. Kinajjukiurwa nti Nabbanja si yasoose okulumba abalambuzi ku ngeri gyebakolamu emirimu gyabwe, gyebuvuddeko Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yavaayo natabukira abalamuzi okuwa ensala mu ngeri egasa abantu ab’olubatu nereka abangi okubonaabona.

headline: Abasawo bannansi batadde wansi ebikola lwa ssente z’ekyemisana
text: Kampala Abasawo ba nnansi awamu n’abazaalisa abeegattira mu kibiina kya ‘Uganda Nurses and Midwives Union (UNMU)’ batadde wansi ebikola nga baagala basasulwe ssente z’ekyemisana eziwera 15,000, gavumenti z’emaze emyaka ebiri ng’ebasuubiza. Bano era balumirizza nti bwe baali bajaguza olunaku lwabwe mu mwaka gwa 2018 nga 12 Muzigo, Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yabasuubiza okubawa akawumbi ka ssiringi kalimba bakateeke mu SACCO yaabwe naye n’okutuusa kati tebakalabanga.  Era bagamba nti Pulezidenti Museveni yasinziira ku mukolo gwe gumu n’ayongeza ssente z’ekyemisana kyabwe okuva ku 2000 ne zidda ku 15000 naye ate basigala baweebwa 2000. Mu bbaluwa akulira ekibiina kya UNMU, Justus Kiplangat, gye yawandiise nga May 4, 2021, yasabye abasawo bannansi wamu n’abazaalisa n’abo ababayambako, okuteeka wansi ebikola kuba gavumenti yeeremye okutuukiriza ekisuubizo kye yakola. “Gavumenti yatumatiza tuleme kwekalakaasa nga basuubizza okuteeka ssente zino mu mbalirira ya 2021 etandika mu mwezi gwa July naye twewuunyizza okulaba  nga gavumenti yeemu eraga ng’ebya ssente zaffe ez’ekyemisana bwe tali nsonga  nkulu mu kaseera kano ezitegeeza nti tetugenda kuzifuna mwaka guno.” Bwekityo ekiwandiiko kya Kiplangat eri abasawo bano  mu ggwanga lyonna bwe kisoma. Annyonnyodde nti basazeewo okwekalakaasa balage obutali bumativu olwa gavumenti okugaana okutuukiriza ekisuubizo kye yabawa emyaka ebiri emabega. “Tugenda kuyita abasawo bannansi n’abazaalisa badde emabega waffe twekalakaasa era tutandika n’ekiro kya nga May 5 (Olwaleero). Tubasaba mudde eka okutuusa nga ssente zaffe ez’ekyemisana ziteereddwa mu mbalirira y’omwaka guno.” Kiplangat bwe yagambye.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga awakanyizza ekya Uganda okuva mu mukago gw’abatunda emmwanyi mu nsi yonna
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Uganda egenda kufiirwa kinene singa egenda mu maaso n’okuva mu mukago omwegattirwa ensi ezirima emmwanyi n’okuzitunda ogwa ‘International Coffee Agreement 2007 (ICA)’nga yeekwasa ensonga ennafu ezibadde zisobolwa okwogerwako ne zisalirwa amagezi. Bino Katikkiro Mayiga yabyogedde aggulawo enteekateeka y’Oluwalo ey’omwaka 2022 mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokusatu n’alaga obutali bumativu ku ngeri ensonga eno gye yakwatiddwamu. “Bw’oba mu mukago gwa ICO kitegeeza nti emmwanyi zo zibeera zikakasiddwa mu nsi zonna gy’ozitwala ku mutindo naye ate bw’ovaayo kitegeeza ntiemmwanyi zo gy’ozitwala ojja kumalanga kwewozaako. Oba ng’atunda amazzi g’okunywa nga tolina kabonero ka UNBS wano mu ggwanga. Kisobola okukendeeza ebbeeyi y’emmwanyi. Ffe tugamba tusigale mu International Coffee Organisation,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Katikkiro Mayiga yalambuludde nti Uganda efunamu kinene bw’esigala mu mukago guno so nga singa eguvaawo emmwanyi egenda kugwa akatale ng’abantu ababadde bakola ogw’okugitunda bawandulwe ku mirimu ekigenda okuzza obulimi bw’ekirime kino emabega. Owek. Mayiga yannyonnyodde nti eby’okusitula omutindo tebibeera bya lunaku lumu wabula biwanvu nga bitwala ekiseera ekiwanvu okusobola okuteekateeka nga n’ensimbi aba UCDA z babaliddeko eziwera obukadde 200 ezibadde zisasulwa nga bammemba buli mwaka ntono nnyo okubaako kye zikyusa. Katikkiro Mayiga yaagambye ntiekitongole kya Uganda Coffee Development Authoritybaali bateekeddwa okusooka okutegeeza eggwanga ku bizibu bye basanze mu mukago guno so si kumala gaguvaamu ng’eggwanga teritegedde. Owek. Mayiga yagasseeko nti bawuliziganyiza n’abakulira omukago guno nayeUganda tetwalangayo kwemulugunya kwayo ku ebyo ebiginyigiriza mu mukago guno wadde okutuma omukulembeze okubyogerako nga tebannagufuluma n’abuuza lwaki abakulira UCDA tebaasooka kutegeeza ggwanga ku bizibu biriyo mu kifo ky’okuwa obuwi ensonga 7 nga baguvaamu. Okusinziira ku Mayiga,amawanga agasigadde mu ndagaano gakola ebitundu93 ku buli 100 ku mmwanyi ezitundibwa mu nsi yonna ate ebitundu 64 ku buli 100 ku kaawa anywebwa mu nsi yonna nga Uganda ekyetaaga. Ono yannyonnyodde nti olw’okuba baagala okukyusa embeera y’abantu ba Kabaka baawalirizibwaokutandika enteekateeka y’Emmwanyi Terimba era n’asaba bannakabula okugijjumbira kuba obungi bw’emmwanyi Uganda z’etunda ebweru w’eggwanga zeeyongedde era omwaka oguweddeUganda yafunye ensimbi ezisoba mu bukadde bwa ddoola 700. Mayiga alaze nti Uganda bw’eba esigadde mu mukago guno erina okwongerako okubeera n’abalimisa abatuuka ku bantu, ebikozesebwa ebituufu n’akatale bakagobeko eddagala effu, bazuule ebituufu ku kirwadde ekikaza emmwanyi era banoonye akatale mu kifo ky’okunaayiza ebizibu ebiri ebunaayira. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti wakati nga bannayuganda batandise okufuna akasente mu mmwanyi ate Uganda we yaviridde mu mukago ogutaba abatunzi b’emmwanyi ekya ICO ky’agamba nti kyabulabe eri ekirime ky’emmwanyi mu ggwanga. Ku nsonga y’Oluwalo olwatongezeddwa,Katikkiro Mayiga yategeezezza nti okusobola okukung’aanya ssente, abakulembeddemu babeera balina okuwuliziganya n’okukolagana obulungi n’abantu kuba Ssaabasajja Kabaka akulembera bantu so si miti era ng’abantu be balina okusoosowazibwa mu nteekateeka eno ne basobola okuyimirizaawo Obwakabaka nga bwe balinda Federo kubanga ekitiibwa kya Buganda bulijjo kiri mu bantu baayo kwekolera. Owek. Mayiga yategeezezza nti baagala okulaba nti abantu ba Buganda balina emmere ebamala era nga basula bulungi, basomesa abaana, okwejjanjabya n’okwetuusaako ebyetaago ebyenjawulo byonna bisoboka singa omuntu abaako akasente kafuna okuva mu ebyo by’akola kuba Buganda ne bw’efuna Federo atalina kye bakolatebajja kuganyulwa. International Coffee Orgaisation yabangibwawo mu 1963 n’ekigendererwa ky’okugatta amawanga agalima kiyambeko okukuuma omutindo gwazo, okunoonya n’okukkaanya ku bbeeyi y’emmwanyi mu katale k’ensi yonna ssaako okukkaanya ku nsubulagana n’emisolo egikwata ku mmwanyi.

headline: Poliisi Etangaazizza Ku By’omuggalo; Gukyagenda Mu Maaso
text: Fred Enanga ayogerera poliisi Olwaleero Bannayuganda bakeeredde mukusoberwa kuki kyebalina okukola oluvanyuma lw’okwogera kw’omukulembze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ekiro ekyakeesezza olwa leero. Museveni yakkirizza emmotoka z’obuyonjo wamu n’ezolukale okuddamu okukola kyokka zino naagamba nti zijja kulindamu gavumenitye emala okuwa buli Munnayuganda akakookolo akabikka emimwa n’ennyindo. Ono era yaggudde amaduuka gwonna agatali mu bizimbe biyite arcade oba mall. Wabula era tekyategeerekese oba bino ebiragiro nabyo bitandikirawo okukola oba nedda. Abantu mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo bakedde kujjayo mmotoka zaabwe wabula abasirikale ba poliisi n’amagye abali ku misanvu egy’enjawulo egyateekebwa mu nguudo obwedda babalagira baddeyo ewaka. Omwogezi wa Poliisi mu ggwanga Fred Enanga ategeezezza Bannamawulire ku ssengejjero ly’amawulire ga gavumenti erya Uganda Media Centre mu Kampala nti okutuusa nga gavumenti ewadde buli Munnayugnda mask, omuggalo gukyaliwo. “Omukulembeze w’eggwanga yakyogedde bulungi nti buli muntu alina okwambala mask era nga mask zino ziri mukukolebwa kale n’0lwekyo, omuggalo gugenda genda mumaaso okutuusa nga June 2, oba nga gavumenti evuddeyo neyongera okutangaaza,” Enanga bweyagambye. Okusinziira ku mwogezi wa Pulezidenti Don Wanyama, olwaleero Museveni wakwogerako eri eggwanga essaawa bbiri ezakawungeezi okongera okutangaaza ku biragirobye.

headline: Owek. Ssekabembe asabye Museveni ayimbule abavubuka abaakwatibwa olw’ebyobufuzi
text: Minisita w’abavubuka emizannyo n’okwewummuza mu Buganda, Owek. Henry Moses Ssekabembe Kiberu, asabye omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni okwekuba mu kifuba ayimbule bazzukulu be bonna abali mu makomera ku nsonga z’ebyobufuzi kuba tebalina musango. Bino abyogeredde Ssese bw’abadde asisinkanye abakulembezeb’eggombolola ya Ssaabaddu Kasekulo nga akomekereza okulambula kw’abaddekomu kitundu kino okumalidde ddala ennaku 4 ku mirimu emitongole egy’Obwakabaka. Owek. Ssekabembe agamba nti embeera eriwo ereetera abantu obulumi ku mitima obutali bwangu kuwonyezebwa kyokka n’alabula abantu b’e Ssese okukomya okulonda abakulembeze abatagasa bwe baba baagala enkulaakulana okubatuukako. Okusaba bwati kiddiride abakulembeze b’abavubuka mu ggombolola eno okumuloopera nga bannaabwe abawerako bwe bali mu makomera olwebyobufuzi ekireetedde n’abamu okutya okubyenyigiramu. Kinajjukirwa nti Minisita Ssekabembe okulambula kuno yaakutandika ku Lwakuna lwa Ssabbiiti ewedde era nga ku bugenyi buno abadde akumaakuma abavubuka n’okubateekateeka mu ngeri ez’enjawulo ez’okukulaakulanya Obwakabaka n’okuzimba obukulembeze, ssaako okusisinkana abavubuka abakola emirimu egyenjawulo. Owek. Ssekabembe yagguddewo ekyoto ky’abavubuka, emipiira gy’eggombolola za Kabaka egisokedde ddala n’asisinkana n’eyali Kweba Fr. Christopher Walusimbi e Bukasa. Oluvannyuma minisita asisinkanye abakulembeze b’abavubuka b’olukiiko lw’essaza ly’e Ssese n’aba Buganda ng’ensisinkano eno ebadde ku mbuga enkulu era n’alayiza olukiiko olufuzi olw’essaza. Abakulembeze bano baloopedde Minisita ku bavubuka b’ekitundu kino abafuna ssente wabula ne bazirya kivubi, ssaako okumulojjera ennaku gye bayitamu naddala mu by’obulamu nga batuuka n’okunoonya obupiira ne bubabula. Ye omwami w’essaza ly’e Ssese, Kweba Augustine Kasirye akiikiriddwa omwami w’eggombolola, ono asabye Minisita Ssekabembe okubayambako naddala mu mipiira gy’Amasaza kubanga Abassese banyigirizibwa nnyo ebitagambika mu by’ensimbi.

headline: Kabaka asiimye okugabula ab’e Bulemeezi olw’okuwangula egy’amasaza
text: Kabaka ng’akwasa ab’e Bulemeezi ekikopo Musasi yaffe Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda mu ssaza lye ery’e Bulemeezi mu nteekateeka y’okubeebaza olw’okuwangula ekikopo ky’emipiira gy’amasaza 2019. Nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Bulange Mmengo, Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu, minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo n’okwewumuzza, Kabaka wakulabikako ku lwokuna nga 09/01/2020 ku ssaawa ssatu ez’okumakya. Sekabembe ategeezezza nti enteekateeka eno yanjawulo era yabyafaayo kubanga ebadde tebangawo bukyanga mipiira gy’amasaza gitandika. “Ssaabasajja asiimye okusiima banna Bulemeezi bonna n’okusingira ddala olukiiko oluddukanya omupiira e Bulemeezi n’etiimu yonna oluvanyuma lw’okuwangula ekikopo 2019,” Sekabembe bwategeezezza. Akunze abantu ba Kabaka bonna mu Buganda ku ssaawa bbiri ez’okumakya okuba nga bakkalidde bulungi mu bifo byabwe ku kisaawe e Bamunaanika wabweru w’olubiri. “Mujje mufune obubaka bwonna era mubeewo nga nannyini nsi agabula Obuganda. Awaddeyo ente bbiri era zaamaze dda okutuuka e Bamunaanika,”Sekabembe bwagambye. Tiimu ya Bulemeezi okutuuka ku buwanguzi, yamala kukuba tiimu ya Busiro, ggoolo1:0.

headline: Tumukunde  atongozza ekisinde ekinamuyamba okuwangula obwapulezidenti
text: Eyali minisita w’ebyokwerinda era munnamagye eyawwumula Lt. Gen Henry Tumukunde atongozza ekisinde ekipya era nalangirira nti wakwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti bw’eggwanga. Tumukunde yagambye nti talina kibiina mukisinde kye kyatuumye ‘Renewed Uganda’ wansi w’omulamwa ogugamba nti ‘Its Possible (Kisoboka). “Omulamwa gwaffe tugenda gukyuusa mu nnimi endala, njagala twegatte ffenna abalwanirira omulamwa ogumu era nga kino tugenda kiteekaamu amaany. Nsuubira nti ku mulundi guno bannayuganda bonna bagenda kwegatta kubanga kisoboka, ” Tumukunde bweyategeezezza. Tumukunde bino yabyogeredde Kololo ku Lwokusatu era nalaga nga bwali mukufuba okulaba nga bakolera wamu nga abavuganya. Tumukunde era ayanjudde ttiimu egenda okumunoonyezza akalulu mu bitundu by’enjawulo okuli; Acholi , Lango, Teso, Karamoja, Sebei, Bukedi, Bugisu, Busoga, Mukono, Mubende, Kigezi, Luweero, Mpigi, Masaka, Tororo, Rwenzori ne Ankole.

headline: Obuwumbi 61 bwebwetaagibwa okulayiza pulezidenti
text: Esther Mbayo asooka ku kkono ng’ali mukakiiko  Amaka gw’obwapulezidenti geetaaga obuwumbi 61 okusobola okulayiza pulezidenti anawangula akalulu ka b onna akanaabeerawo mu 2021. Ensimbi zino era zigenda kuyambako mu nzirukanya y’emirimue gy’ababaka ba pulezidenti mu disitulikiti. Ng’alabiseeko mu kakiiko akakola ku nsonga z’obwapulezidenti minisita avunanyizibwa ku nsonga zino Esther Mbayo yagambye nti okulayiza pulezidenti kugwa mu mbalirira y’omwka 2020/2021 kyokka nga essente zino tezaateereddwa mu mbaliria eno.   Yayongeddeko nti woofiisi ye yabadde eweereddwa obuwumbi 7.7 zokka kwezo obuwumbi 11.2 ezeetaagibwa okuddukanya woofiisi z’aba RDC. Mbayo yagambye nti newankubadde ng’omuwendo gwa zi disitulikiti gweyongedde, palamenti teyongezanga sente zebawa. Mbayo era yasabye obuwumbi obulala 924 okusobola okugula emidaali gavumenti gyewa abazira eb’enjawulo naddala egya bakulembeze b’amawanga amalala. “Tetwagala kuswaza mukulembeze waggwanga nga talina mudaala gusaanidde gwakuwa bakulembeze balala,”Mbayo bweyagambye.

headline: Ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi binyoose  e Mbale nga ogwa Kyagulanyi guwulirwa
text: Embeera ebadde ya bunkenke ku Lwokusatu ku kkooti e Mbale ng’Omulamuzi,addamu okuwulira omusango Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi gweyawaabira abakulu mu poliisi olw’okumulemesa okukyala ku leediyo ya BCU ku ntandika y’omwezi guno. Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi ku kkooti e Mbale Abangi ba Kyagulanyi baakedde mu bungi okweyiwa ku kkooti era olwamulabye nebagala okuyingira naye munda mu kkooti ekintu poliisi kyeyagaanye nga egamba nti kivvoola ebiragiro bya COVID-19. Kino abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi bakigaanye ekyawalirizza poliisi okubakubamu omukka ogubalagala wamu n’okukuba amasasi mu bbanga okubagumbulula. Omu ku bawagizi yagambye nti, “Eno kkooti kifo kyalukale, tewali nsonga lwaki batugobaganya, kuno kuwamba kkooti kwenyini, tetugenda kukkiriza Pulezidenti waffe kuyingirayo yekka.”  Oluvanyma Kyagulanyi ne bannamateeka be bayingidde munda mu kkooti era okuwulira omusango nekutandika wakati mu kubwatuka n’okwesooza kw’amasasi wabweru wa kkooti. Abawawaabirwa okuli; RDC w’e Mbale, DPC, OC ne DISO bonna babaddewo mu kkooti ate nga Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi, Martin Okoth Ochola yakikkiriddwa bannamateeka be era omusango negugenda mu maaso. Wabula omulamuzi Andre Katumbuki yategeezezza nti, “Olwokuba wabaddewo okulemwa okuziyiza abantu okubeera abangi, omusango guno gwongeddeyo okutuusa nga embeera eteredde.” Kino bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi bakiwakanyizza nga bagamba nti tekyabadde kya bwenkanya eri omuntu wabwe. Munnamateeka wa Kyagulanyi Medard Ssegona yategeezezza, nti tebamatidde nansalawo ya mulamuzi kubanga tewali amanyi ddi COVID-19 lwanaggwawo omusango guddemu okuwulirwa. Ssegona yagambye nti bakutuula n’omuntu wabwe balabe ekiddako. Kyagulanyi yagambye nti, “ Kkooti eri mu buwambe, tulina okulowooza nti omulamuzi naye bamuwadde ebiragiro kubanga agaanye okuwulira omusango gwaffe era kino tetukirabangako.”  Kinajjukirwa nti ku ntandikwa y’omwezi guno abapoliisi balemesa Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi okugenda ku leediyo ya BCU gyeyali ayitiddwa okukubaganya ebirowoozo.

headline: Mutabani wa Bebe Cool, Alpha akubye ggoolo makunale
text: Mutabani w’Omuyimbi Moses Ssali, Apha Ssali ateebedde ttiimu ya Proline ggoolo mu mpaka za Uganda Cup ey’omwaka guno bwebabadde battunka ne ttiimu ya Myda F.C. Abategeera omupiira bagamba nti okuva ttiimu ya Proline bweyatandikibwawo mu 2005, babadde tebafunanga musambi alinga Alpha Ssali era muzzukulu w’eyali Minisita Bidandi Ssali. Ono bazadde be bakoze kinene okusobozesa ekirooto kye eky’okusamba omupiira era yalabikidde ku ttiimu y’eggwanga ey’abato abali wansi w’emyaka 20. Wadde ono teyazannya yo mupiira mu mpaka zino ezaali e Mauritania ekyaleetera abamu okutandika okubuusabuusa ekitone kya Alpha n’abamu okulumiriza Kitaawe nti yamubasibako.

headline: Gavumenti egenda kunoonyereza ku basaba obuwanana okuziika abafa Corona
text: Gavumenti eweze okunoonyereza ku bigambibwa nti kkampuni ez’enjawulo ezikola ku kuziika abafu zipaluusizza ebisale ku bantu ababeera bafudde COVID-19. Bino bijjidde mu kiseera n’eggwanga liri mu kulwanagana n’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyazzeemu okulumba Uganda nga buli lukya omuwendo gw’abakwatibwa wamu n’abafa gweyongera. Eggulo we bwazibidde ng’abantu 1100 be bakwatiddwa ate 49 nebafa ekituusizza omuwendo gw’abakwatiddwa ku 65,631 ate abafudde ne bawera 508 ate nga 48,648 bsimattuse. Akulira akakiiko akalwanyisa ekirwadde kino mu ggwanga era omuwi w’amagezi eri Pulezidenti ku birwadde ebikambwe, Dr. Monica Musenero, agamba nti ekya kkampuni zino okusaba obuwanana kigenda kunoonyerezebwako. “Ng’enda kunoonyereza ndabe, nafunye amawulire nti kkampuni eziziika zisaba obukadde 7 okusobola okuziika omuntu afudde Corona.” Dr. Musenero bw’annyonnyodde. Ono agamba nti Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yayisa ebiragiro ebirina okugobererwa okuziika aba Corona naye mu byo temwali kyakuba nti ttiimu ey’enjawulo y’erina okuziika abafudde Corona. Dr. Musenero annyonnyodde nti singa omulambo gubeera gukoleddwako bulungi ne gufuuyirwa, gusobola okuweebwa aba famire olwo nabo ne bafune engoye ezeesabikibwa ezimanyiddwa nga ‘ Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) olwo ne bagenda mu maaso n’okuziika. Ono yalabudde abantu okwewala okukung’aanira mu kuziika mu bungi nti kino kisobola okuvaako okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kino.

headline: Hajji Nadduli : Abeesimbyewo  tebakikola lwa kwagala NRM naye baagala ssente
text: Nakaseke Eyaliko ssentebe wa NRM mu Buganda, Hajji Abdul Nadduli, ategeezezza nti abantu abavuddeyo okwesimba ku mutabani we Jakana Sulaiman Nadduli, ku kifo kya Nakaseke Central nti tebazze lwa kulumirirwa kibiina wabula baagala kwekolera ssente. Hajji Nadduli nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire e Nakaseke Nadduli okulya mu ttama, abadde awerekeddeko mutabani we Jakana abadde azzeeyo okwewandiisa oluvannyuma lw’okulemererwa olunaku lw’eggulo olw’ensobi y’amannya ge obutakwatagana nabiwandiiko bye. “Bano abazze si bamwoyo gwa ‘spirit’ ya NRM, mwoyo gwa ‘spirit’ ya ssente, bazze kulya mu kintu anti akuwa okubaaga,” Nadduli bw’ategeezezza. Nadduli annyonnyodde nti bangi ku bantu abaalwanirira gavumenti eno okujja mu buyinza baabivaako dda nga kizibu okusanga abantu nga ye ng’alwana okulaba nga wabaawo obwenkanya n’asaba abalonzi okumuwagira. Oluvannyuma lw’okusunsulwamu Jakana ayogedde ku nsobi eyabaddewo yabadde ya linnya Nadduli eri ku Ndagamuntu ye okubula ku biwandiiko bye eby’obuyigirize n’akakasa nti obuyigirize obwetaagisa bwonna abulina. “Bagambye nti erinnya ly’Owek. Nadduli siryange ku biwandiiko teririiko ate nga ku Ndagamuntu kweriri. Tugenze netubikolako naye omukisa olw’okuba nti gwabadde gutuli ku mugongo, bwe twatuuseeyo nga Hajji amanyiddwa nebagamba nti tetuyinza kulemesa mutabani katwanguyeeko ebintu bino asobole okuddayo okwewandiisa era nebabitereeza,” Jakana bw’annyonnyodde. Ono aweze nga bw’agenda okuwangula akalulu kano kubanga ebintu bingi bye bakoze okulaba nga bakisitula. Jakana agenda kuvuganya Hajjati Saidah Bbumba ne Godfrey Kiyingi abasunsuddwa olunaku lw’eggulo ku kifo kya Nakaseke Central mu Palamenti. Abalala abasunsuddwa kuliko; Charles Kawuma Nsereko ayagala okuggyayo Ssemakula e Nakaseke South, n’Omubaka Sarah Najjuma.

headline: Omulugube gusse eby’obufuzi bya wano – Wasswa Lule
text: Bya Gladys Nanyombi Lubaga Munnabyafaayo era omutunuulizi w’ensonga z’ebyobufuzi Wasswa Lule, arabudde bannayuganda ku mulugube mu bannabyabufuzi  wakati nga beetegekeera akalulu ka 202i nti guno gwe gwonoonye ebyobufuzi bye Uganda.   Bino Lule yabyogeredde mu mboozi eyakafubo gyeyabaddemu ne GAMBUUZE ku Lwokusatu lwa wiiki eno nategeeza nti abantu abasoba mu asatu bonna okuvaayo nga baagala kuyitira mu Lubaga South bagende mu Palamenti kiraga kuggwamu nsa. Lule yanyonyodde nga omusimbi ogupokerwa ababaka ba palamenti n’abakulembeze ku mitendera egy’enjawulo bwekiserebeza omutindo gw’abantu abeesimbawo nga buli alina akasente ke kati alowooza kuyingira bya bufuzi bamulonde. “Abantu tebyalonda muntu agenda kutuusa bizibu byabwe eri bekikwatako wabula kati balonda oyo abagulira ku ssukaali ne ssabuuni olwo ye olumala okufuna kyayagala taddamu kulabikako eri balonzi okubabuuza nsonga ki ezibanyiga zebandyagadde oba olyawo zikolebweko,” Lule bweyalambuludde. Ono yategeezezza nga abakulembeze tebakyalina budde bwakwogerako nababalonda era nga kino nga kino kisebengesezza enkulakulana ze bitundu wabula ono omusango wabula nategeeza nti guno gusinga balonzi kubanga tebamala kwetegereza muntu gwebalonda. Lule yalaze nga ensonga y’okuvaayo okukulembera abantu bweri ennene nga terina kuzannyirwamu neyeewunya okulaba nga abantu abasoba mu 35 bonna bavuddeyo nga baagala ekifo ekirimu omubaka Kato Lubwama nategeeza nti wadde abamu ku bano obuyigirize obulagirwa mu ssemateeka babulina naye bayala nnyo era nalabula abalonzi okubeera abegendereza ku ani ggwe baanalonda. Abantu ababadde bakeesowolayo okulamuza entebe y’ Omubaka Kato Lubwama mu kiseera kino kuliko; Aloysius Mukasa, John Ken Lukyamuzi , Eugenia Nassolo , Samuel Lubega Mukaaku ne Kennenth Male. Abalala kuliko; Musa Mbaziira, Sadat Mukiibi,  munnamawulireDean Lubowa Ssaava , Grace Nakanywagi, Masagazi, Junior Ssebalamu, Habib Buwembo,Isamail Ssemakula, Xavier Katabalwa, Kevin Nsubuga n’abalala bangi. Omu ku bali mu lwokaano luno Lubega Mukaaku, yawagidde ensonga za Wasswa Lule nategeeza nga Uganda bwetakyalina bakulembeeze aalumirirwa bantu era kati mu by’obufuzi alinamu akasente yayitawo so ssi oyo alina ebirowoozo ebiyinza okugasa eggwanga. Mukaaku yalaze nga abantu bwebaweddemu essuubi olw’obulimba obuyitiridde mu by’obufuzi era nakubiriza abakulembeze okufuna ekyo ekitono baleme kwesiiba mu kufuna binene ebibaviraako okulumya abantu ababatuma mu palamenti. Ate yye munne bwebali ku mbiranye Aloysious Mukasa yanyonyodde nti wakyaliwo essuubi okufuna omuntu alumirirwa abantu. Omutuuze mu Lubaga South Male Robin, yategeezezza nga bwatasobola kulonda muntu yenna nga talina kyamuwadde kubanga ebbanga lyonna lyamaze nga alonda mu bwenkanya wadde bawa akalulu bayitamu naye ekitundu kye tekirina kikyuukako.

headline: Mwongere okukola ennyo – Minisita Mayanja Nkalubo
text: Minisita w’ebyettaka, eby’obulimi wamu ne Bulungibwansi mu Bwakabaka Owek. Hajati Nassejje Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo akubirizza abantu okwongera okukola ennyo basobole okwegobako obwavu. Minisita Mayanja Nkalubo nga ayanirizza amakula Owek. Mayanja bino abyogedde attikula Amakula okuva eri abantu ba ssabasajja Kabaka okuva muggombolola ya Ssabagabo Ngogwe Kyaggwe ku Lwokutaano e Mmengo mu Kampala. Minisita Mayanja yasabye abakulembezze kumitendera egy’ enjawulo okwetikka obuvunaanyizibwa bw’okulambula n’okusomesa abantu ku by’obulamu kubanga obulamu bwe bugagga. Kattikiro webyaalo bya Ssabasajja Luutu Moses yabasabye okuyingiza abaana abato mu nteekateeka zonna ezirimu okutuukirizza ennono. Eyakulembeddemu abantu bano Ssalongo Kisekka Livingstone era nga ye mwami we Ggombolola ye Ngoggwe, yalaze okusomoozebwa okuliwo naddala okw’ abavubi okugobwa ku nnyanja ate nga gwemulimu kwebalya.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asiimye emirimu egikoleddwa Omusumba Ssemogerere
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asiimye emirimu egikoleddwa abadde Omusumba wa Kasana Luweero mu Bulemeezi, Paul Ssemogerere nga kati ono yalondeddwa nga Ssaabasumba omuggya ow’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala. “Oba nkulise bannakasana Luweero oba mbasaasire, naye byonna bikola okubakulisa okuba ettaka eggimun’okubasaasira okuviibwako Omusumba. Naye nange nneebaza Ssaabasumba omulonde olw’emirimu gy’akoze mu Kasana Luweero.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Obubaka buno Katikkiro Mayiga abuweeredde ku kyalo Kaswa mu maka ga Dr. James Kyeyune leero ku Lwokusatu. Ono ategeezezza nti Omusumba Ssemogerere amanyiddwa ng’omuntu w’abantu ekintu ekizibu ennyo ku abo ababeera mu bifo by’obukulembeze kuba obuvunaanyizibwa bubeera bungi.  Okusinziira ku Owek. Mayiga, amusiimye olw’okutumbula ebyenjigiriza n’okulyowa emyoyo nga byonna bituukiddwako olw’obutetekanya n’obwetowaze bw’Omusumba ono kuba essaza lino libadde likyali tto. “Obwetowaze buzibu nnyo ng’oli mukulu kale bw’osanga omuntu omukulu nga mwetowaze, omwebalizaako Katonda,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agasseeko. Owek. Mayiga era amwebazizza olw’okwagala ennyo Obwakabaka bwa Buganda naddala mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo ezibadde mu ssaza Bulemeezi era abadde akwatizaako Kkangaawo obutakoowa okusobola okuzza essaza Bulemeezi ku ntikko. Katikkiro era asabye abantu okweggyamu endowooza y’okwagala okuyambibwa buli kaseera era n’awa bannabulemeezi amagezi okwesonyiwa enjogera y’okuba ng’olutalo lw’abakosa n’abasa okujjukira ebyafaayo naye tebabiganya kubafuga. Ku lulwe, Ssaabasumba omulonde asiimye bannaluweero naddala abavubuka olw’okukolagana obulungi naye ne basobola okutambuza emirimu gy’Omukama.  “Abavubuka mubadde temwetaaga miguwa era mukoze bulungi nnyo emirimu gy’Omukama ne tutambuza bulungi essaza. Eno teriiyo bantu bakadde nnyo naye bonna abaliyo baasiima.” Ssaabasumba omulonde bw’ategeezezza. Omusumba Ssemogerere bano abasuubizza nti akyali mu kitundu kino era bajja kusigala nga batambulira wamu kuba Obusumba bw’essaza ekkulu erya Kampalabukwatagana bulungi n’obwe Luweero. Bino we bijjidde ng’Obusumba bw’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala butegeka omukolo gw’okutuuza Ssaabasumba Ssemogerere mu butongole ku Lwokubiri nga 25/01/2022 ng’omukolo gwakubeera ku Lutikko e Lubaga.

headline: KITALO! Dr. Paul Kawanga Ssemogerere afudde
text: Eyaliko Ssenkaggale wa Democratic Party (DP), Dr Paul Kawanga Ssemogerere afiiridde mu makaage e Lubaga ku myaka 90. Dr Ssemwogerere yakulembera DP okugitwala mu kalulu ka 1980, akawangulwa Dr Apollo Milton Obote wadde nga aba DP baawakanya ebyavaamu nga bagamba nti obuwanguzi bw’alina kubeera bubwe naye nebunyagibwa. Ssemogerere afiiridde mu makaage gyaggyiddwa enkya yaleero natwalibwa mu ddwaliro e Lubaga. Ebyava mu kalulu byanyiiza bangi era abantu omwali Yoweri Kaguta Museveni baakwata emmundu nebagenda mu nsiko okulwanyisa Obote nga bamulumiriza okubba obululu. Museveni yatondawo ekibiina ki PRA (People’s Resistance Army) ekyavaamu NRA (National Resistance Army) nga alwana okuggyako Obote. Waliwo n’abalala okwali Andrew Lutakome Kayiira nekibiina kye ki Uganda Freedom Movement. Wabula Ssemogerere wadde akalulu akaali kabbiddwa kaali kake yagaana okwegatta ku bagenda mu nsiko nga agamba nti olutalo lwali lujja kutwala obulamu bw’abantu abawerako nasaba bateese buteesa. Gyebyagwera nga olutalo olwaleeta Museveni mu buyinza lufiiriddemu abantu abawera emitwalo 30 wakati wa 1981 ne 1986 weyawambira Kampala. Oluvannyuma Museveni yalonda Ssemogerere nga Minisita w’ensonga ez’omunda okuva 1986 okutuuka mu 1988 ng’akabonero ak’okugezaako okugatta bannansi ab’endowooza ez’enjawulo. Ssemwogerere yaweereza mu bifo ebyenjawulo mu gavumenti ya Pulezidenti Museveni wabula nga alwana nnyo okulaba nti ebibiina by’obufuzi biddawo mu ggwanga era yawaaba emisango egiwera mu kkooti ku nsonga eno. Mu mwaka gwa 1995 yava mu gavumenti ya Museveni era bwatyo neyeesimbawo mu kalulu ka 1996 wabula era akalulu nebakamukuba. Ssemogerere yalwana nnyo okusigala nga akuumira awamu DP eyali eyongera okwetemamu buli lukya era obukulembeze bwe obw’emyaka 25 nga ye Ssenkaggale bwakola kyamaanyi. Oluvannyuma obwa Ssenkaggale yabuwa munywanyi we era eyaliko Mmeeya wa Kampala, John Ssebaana Kizito.

headline: Disan Galiwango Ayogedde Byayagala Okukolera Ttiimu Ya Vipers
text: Disan Galiwango agambye ayagala kuyamba tiimu ye eya Vipers okulaba nga yeeriisa enkuuli mu kikopo kya CAF Champions League ekigenda okubaayo sizoni ejja . Galiwango yeeggase ku Vipers nga July 1 oluvannyuma lw’endagaano ye okugwako ne ttiimu ya Express FC. Ono yatadda omukono ku ndagano ya myaka ena (4) mu ttiimu ya Vipers FC esangibwa e Kitende era nga yakuggwako mu 2024. Galiwango yategeezezza nti musanyufu nnyo okukomawo ewaka. Kinajjukirwa nti omuvubuka ono yamalira ekibiina eky’omukaaga (S.6) ku St. Mary’s Kitende nga eno ttiimu ya Vipers gyesimbye amakanda. Galiwango yategeezezza nga bulijjo bwali mubwetaavu bw’okuzannyirako tiimu eno. Galiwango yategeezezza nti ki Vipers yeesinga okubeera n’embeera ennungi wamu n’okulabirira abazannyi oblungi mu ttiimu za Uganda zonna. Galiwango yategeezezza nti agenda kukola nnyo nga bwekyetaagisa okulaba nga Vipers agisitula okusinga bwagisanze n’okusingira ddala mu sizoni ejja. Vipers egenda kukiikirira Uganda mu CAF Champions league sizoni ejja oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula ekikopo kya Uganda Premier league omulundi ogw’okuna. Galiwango amaze sizoni bbiri mu 2019/20 mu tiimu ya Express era ng’asamba mu nnamba 3, 11 ne 7.
